1039void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32_or(Register dst, Register lhs, Register rhs) {
1040 liftoff::EmitCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::orl, &Assembler::movl>(this, dst,
1041 lhs, rhs);
1042}
1043
1044void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32_ori(Register dst, Register lhs, int32_t imm) {
1045 liftoff::EmitCommutativeBinOpImm<&Assembler::orl, &Assembler::movl>(this, dst,
1046 lhs, imm);
1047}
1048
1049void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32_xor(Register dst, Register lhs, Register rhs) {
1050 liftoff::EmitCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::xorl, &Assembler::movl>(this, dst,
1051 lhs, rhs);
1052}
1053
1054void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32_xori(Register dst, Register lhs, int32_t imm) {
1055 liftoff::EmitCommutativeBinOpImm<&Assembler::xorl, &Assembler::movl>(
1056 this, dst, lhs, imm);
1057}
1058
1059namespace liftoff {
1060template <ValueType::Kind type>
1061inline void EmitShiftOperation(LiftoffAssembler* assm, Register dst,
1062 Register src, Register amount,
1063 void (Assembler::*emit_shift)(Register)) {
1064 // If dst is rcx, compute into the scratch register first, then move to rcx.
1065 if (dst == rcx) {
1066 assm->Move(kScratchRegister, src, ValueType::Primitive(type));
1067 if (amount != rcx) assm->Move(rcx, amount, ValueType::Primitive(type));
1068 (assm->*emit_shift)(kScratchRegister);
1069 assm->Move(rcx, kScratchRegister, ValueType::Primitive(type));
1070 return;
1071 }
1072
1073 // Move amount into rcx. If rcx is in use, move its content into the scratch
1074 // register. If src is rcx, src is now the scratch register.
1075 bool use_scratch = false;
1076 if (amount != rcx) {
1077 use_scratch =
1078 src == rcx || assm->cache_state()->is_used(LiftoffRegister(rcx));
1079 if (use_scratch) assm->movq(kScratchRegister, rcx);
1080 if (src == rcx) src = kScratchRegister;
1081 assm->Move(rcx, amount, ValueType::Primitive(type));
1082 }
1083
1084 // Do the actual shift.
1085 if (dst != src) assm->Move(dst, src, ValueType::Primitive(type));
1086 (assm->*emit_shift)(dst);
1087
1088 // Restore rcx if needed.
1089 if (use_scratch) assm->movq(rcx, kScratchRegister);
1090}
1091} // namespace liftoff
1092
1093void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32_shl(Register dst, Register src,
1094 Register amount) {
1095 liftoff::EmitShiftOperation<ValueType::kI32>(this, dst, src, amount,
1096 &Assembler::shll_cl);
1097}
1098
1099void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32_shli(Register dst, Register src,
1100 int32_t amount) {
1101 if (dst != src) movl(dst, src);
1102 shll(dst, Immediate(amount & 31));
1103}
1104
1105void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32_sar(Register dst, Register src,
1106 Register amount) {
1107 liftoff::EmitShiftOperation<ValueType::kI32>(this, dst, src, amount,
1108 &Assembler::sarl_cl);
1109}
1110
1111void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32_sari(Register dst, Register src,
1112 int32_t amount) {
1113 if (dst != src) movl(dst, src);
1114 sarl(dst, Immediate(amount & 31));
1115}
1116
1117void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32_shr(Register dst, Register src,
1118 Register amount) {
1119 liftoff::EmitShiftOperation<ValueType::kI32>(this, dst, src, amount,
1120 &Assembler::shrl_cl);
1121}
1122
1123void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32_shri(Register dst, Register src,
1124 int32_t amount) {
1125 if (dst != src) movl(dst, src);
1126 shrl(dst, Immediate(amount & 31));
1127}
1128
1129void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32_clz(Register dst, Register src) {
1130 Lzcntl(dst, src);
1131}
1132
1133void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32_ctz(Register dst, Register src) {
1134 Tzcntl(dst, src);
1135}
1136
1137bool LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32_popcnt(Register dst, Register src) {
1138 if (!CpuFeatures::IsSupported(POPCNT)) return false;
1139 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, POPCNT);
1140 popcntl(dst, src);
1141 return true;
1142}
1143
1144void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_add(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
1145 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
1146 if (lhs.gp() != dst.gp()) {
1147 leaq(dst.gp(), Operand(lhs.gp(), rhs.gp(), times_1, 0));
1148 } else {
1149 addq(dst.gp(), rhs.gp());
1150 }
1151}
1152
1153void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_addi(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
1154 int32_t imm) {
1155 if (lhs.gp() != dst.gp()) {
1156 leaq(dst.gp(), Operand(lhs.gp(), imm));
1157 } else {
1158 addq(dst.gp(), Immediate(imm));
1159 }
1160}
1161
1162void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_sub(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
1163 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
1164 if (dst.gp() == rhs.gp()) {
1165 negq(dst.gp());
1166 addq(dst.gp(), lhs.gp());
1167 } else {
1168 if (dst.gp() != lhs.gp()) movq(dst.gp(), lhs.gp());
1169 subq(dst.gp(), rhs.gp());
1170 }
1171}
1172
1173void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_mul(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
1174 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
1175 liftoff::EmitCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::imulq, &Assembler::movq>(
1176 this, dst.gp(), lhs.gp(), rhs.gp());
1177}
1178
1179bool LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_divs(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
1180 LiftoffRegister rhs,
1181 Label* trap_div_by_zero,
1182 Label* trap_div_unrepresentable) {
1183 liftoff::EmitIntDivOrRem<int64_t, liftoff::DivOrRem::kDiv>(
1184 this, dst.gp(), lhs.gp(), rhs.gp(), trap_div_by_zero,
1185 trap_div_unrepresentable);
1186 return true;
1187}
1188
1189bool LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_divu(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
1190 LiftoffRegister rhs,
1191 Label* trap_div_by_zero) {
1192 liftoff::EmitIntDivOrRem<uint64_t, liftoff::DivOrRem::kDiv>(
1193 this, dst.gp(), lhs.gp(), rhs.gp(), trap_div_by_zero, nullptr);
1194 return true;
1195}
1196
1197bool LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_rems(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
1198 LiftoffRegister rhs,
1199 Label* trap_div_by_zero) {
1200 liftoff::EmitIntDivOrRem<int64_t, liftoff::DivOrRem::kRem>(
1201 this, dst.gp(), lhs.gp(), rhs.gp(), trap_div_by_zero, nullptr);
1202 return true;
1203}
1204
1205bool LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_remu(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
1206 LiftoffRegister rhs,
1207 Label* trap_div_by_zero) {
1208 liftoff::EmitIntDivOrRem<uint64_t, liftoff::DivOrRem::kRem>(
1209 this, dst.gp(), lhs.gp(), rhs.gp(), trap_div_by_zero, nullptr);
1210 return true;
1211}
1212
1213void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_and(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
1214 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
1215 liftoff::EmitCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::andq, &Assembler::movq>(
1216 this, dst.gp(), lhs.gp(), rhs.gp());
1217}
1218
1219void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_andi(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
1220 int32_t imm) {
1221 liftoff::EmitCommutativeBinOpImm<&Assembler::andq, &Assembler::movq>(
1222 this, dst.gp(), lhs.gp(), imm);
1223}
1224
1225void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_or(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
1226 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
1227 liftoff::EmitCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::orq, &Assembler::movq>(
1228 this, dst.gp(), lhs.gp(), rhs.gp());
1229}
1230
1231void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_ori(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
1232 int32_t imm) {
1233 liftoff::EmitCommutativeBinOpImm<&Assembler::orq, &Assembler::movq>(
1234 this, dst.gp(), lhs.gp(), imm);
1235}
1236
1237void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_xor(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
1238 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
1239 liftoff::EmitCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::xorq, &Assembler::movq>(
1240 this, dst.gp(), lhs.gp(), rhs.gp());
1241}
1242
1243void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_xori(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
1244 int32_t imm) {
1245 liftoff::EmitCommutativeBinOpImm<&Assembler::xorq, &Assembler::movq>(
1246 this, dst.gp(), lhs.gp(), imm);
1247}
1248
1249void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_shl(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister src,
1250 Register amount) {
1251 liftoff::EmitShiftOperation<ValueType::kI64>(this, dst.gp(), src.gp(), amount,
1252 &Assembler::shlq_cl);
1253}
1254
1255void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_shli(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister src,
1256 int32_t amount) {
1257 if (dst.gp() != src.gp()) movq(dst.gp(), src.gp());
1258 shlq(dst.gp(), Immediate(amount & 63));
1259}
1260
1261void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_sar(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister src,
1262 Register amount) {
1263 liftoff::EmitShiftOperation<ValueType::kI64>(this, dst.gp(), src.gp(), amount,
1264 &Assembler::sarq_cl);
1265}
1266
1267void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_sari(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister src,
1268 int32_t amount) {
1269 if (dst.gp() != src.gp()) movq(dst.gp(), src.gp());
1270 sarq(dst.gp(), Immediate(amount & 63));
1271}
1272
1273void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_shr(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister src,
1274 Register amount) {
1275 liftoff::EmitShiftOperation<ValueType::kI64>(this, dst.gp(), src.gp(), amount,
1276 &Assembler::shrq_cl);
1277}
1278
1279void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_shri(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister src,
1280 int32_t amount) {
1281 if (dst != src) movq(dst.gp(), src.gp());
1282 shrq(dst.gp(), Immediate(amount & 63));
1283}
1284
1285void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_clz(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister src) {
1286 Lzcntq(dst.gp(), src.gp());
1287}
1288
1289void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_ctz(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister src) {
1290 Tzcntq(dst.gp(), src.gp());
1291}
1292
1293bool LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_popcnt(LiftoffRegister dst,
1294 LiftoffRegister src) {
1295 if (!CpuFeatures::IsSupported(POPCNT)) return false;
1296 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, POPCNT);
1297 popcntq(dst.gp(), src.gp());
1298 return true;
1299}
1300
1301void LiftoffAssembler::emit_u32_to_intptr(Register dst, Register src) {
1302 movl(dst, src);
1303}
1304
1305void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32_add(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister lhs,
1306 DoubleRegister rhs) {
1307 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
1308 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
1309 vaddss(dst, lhs, rhs);
1310 } else if (dst == rhs) {
1311 addss(dst, lhs);
1312 } else {
1313 if (dst != lhs) movss(dst, lhs);
1314 addss(dst, rhs);
1315 }
1316}
1317
1318void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32_sub(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister lhs,
1319 DoubleRegister rhs) {
1320 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
1321 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
1322 vsubss(dst, lhs, rhs);
1323 } else if (dst == rhs) {
1324 movss(kScratchDoubleReg, rhs);
1325 movss(dst, lhs);
1326 subss(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
1327 } else {
1328 if (dst != lhs) movss(dst, lhs);
1329 subss(dst, rhs);
1330 }
1331}
1332
1333void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32_mul(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister lhs,
1334 DoubleRegister rhs) {
1335 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
1336 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
1337 vmulss(dst, lhs, rhs);
1338 } else if (dst == rhs) {
1339 mulss(dst, lhs);
1340 } else {
1341 if (dst != lhs) movss(dst, lhs);
1342 mulss(dst, rhs);
1343 }
1344}
1345
1346void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32_div(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister lhs,
1347 DoubleRegister rhs) {
1348 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
1349 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
1350 vdivss(dst, lhs, rhs);
1351 } else if (dst == rhs) {
1352 movss(kScratchDoubleReg, rhs);
1353 movss(dst, lhs);
1354 divss(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
1355 } else {
1356 if (dst != lhs) movss(dst, lhs);
1357 divss(dst, rhs);
1358 }
1359}
1360
1361namespace liftoff {
1362enum class MinOrMax : uint8_t { kMin, kMax };
1363template <typename type>
1364inline void EmitFloatMinOrMax(LiftoffAssembler* assm, DoubleRegister dst,
1365 DoubleRegister lhs, DoubleRegister rhs,
1366 MinOrMax min_or_max) {
1367 Label is_nan;
1368 Label lhs_below_rhs;
1369 Label lhs_above_rhs;
1370 Label done;
1371
1372#define dop(name, ...)do { if (sizeof(type) == 4) { assm->names(...); } else { assm
->named(...); } } while (false) \
1373 do { \
1374 if (sizeof(type) == 4) { \
1375 assm->name##s(__VA_ARGS__); \
1376 } else { \
1377 assm->name##d(__VA_ARGS__); \
1378 } \
1379 } while (false)
1380
1381 // Check the easy cases first: nan (e.g. unordered), smaller and greater.
1382 // NaN has to be checked first, because PF=1 implies CF=1.
1383 dop(Ucomis, lhs, rhs)do { if (sizeof(type) == 4) { assm->Ucomiss(lhs, rhs); } else
{ assm->Ucomisd(lhs, rhs); } } while (false);
1384 assm->j(parity_even, &is_nan, Label::kNear); // PF=1
1385 assm->j(below, &lhs_below_rhs, Label::kNear); // CF=1
1386 assm->j(above, &lhs_above_rhs, Label::kNear); // CF=0 && ZF=0
1387
1388 // If we get here, then either
1389 // a) {lhs == rhs},
1390 // b) {lhs == -0.0} and {rhs == 0.0}, or
1391 // c) {lhs == 0.0} and {rhs == -0.0}.
1392 // For a), it does not matter whether we return {lhs} or {rhs}. Check the sign
1393 // bit of {rhs} to differentiate b) and c).
1394 dop(Movmskp, kScratchRegister, rhs)do { if (sizeof(type) == 4) { assm->Movmskps(kScratchRegister
, rhs); } else { assm->Movmskpd(kScratchRegister, rhs); } }
while (false);
1395 assm->testl(kScratchRegister, Immediate(1));
1396 assm->j(zero, &lhs_below_rhs, Label::kNear);
1397 assm->jmp(&lhs_above_rhs, Label::kNear);
1398
1399 assm->bind(&is_nan);
1400 // Create a NaN output.
1401 dop(Xorp, dst, dst)do { if (sizeof(type) == 4) { assm->Xorps(dst, dst); } else
{ assm->Xorpd(dst, dst); } } while (false);
1402 dop(Divs, dst, dst)do { if (sizeof(type) == 4) { assm->Divss(dst, dst); } else
{ assm->Divsd(dst, dst); } } while (false);
1403 assm->jmp(&done, Label::kNear);
1404
1405 assm->bind(&lhs_below_rhs);
1406 DoubleRegister lhs_below_rhs_src = min_or_max == MinOrMax::kMin ? lhs : rhs;
1407 if (dst != lhs_below_rhs_src) dop(Movs, dst, lhs_below_rhs_src)do { if (sizeof(type) == 4) { assm->Movss(dst, lhs_below_rhs_src
); } else { assm->Movsd(dst, lhs_below_rhs_src); } } while
(false);
1408 assm->jmp(&done, Label::kNear);
1409
1410 assm->bind(&lhs_above_rhs);
1411 DoubleRegister lhs_above_rhs_src = min_or_max == MinOrMax::kMin ? rhs : lhs;
1412 if (dst != lhs_above_rhs_src) dop(Movs, dst, lhs_above_rhs_src)do { if (sizeof(type) == 4) { assm->Movss(dst, lhs_above_rhs_src
); } else { assm->Movsd(dst, lhs_above_rhs_src); } } while
(false);
1413
1414 assm->bind(&done);
1415}
1416} // namespace liftoff
1417
1418void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32_min(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister lhs,
1419 DoubleRegister rhs) {
1420 liftoff::EmitFloatMinOrMax<float>(this, dst, lhs, rhs,
1421 liftoff::MinOrMax::kMin);
1422}
1423
1424void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32_max(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister lhs,
1425 DoubleRegister rhs) {
1426 liftoff::EmitFloatMinOrMax<float>(this, dst, lhs, rhs,
1427 liftoff::MinOrMax::kMax);
1428}
1429
1430void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32_copysign(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister lhs,
1431 DoubleRegister rhs) {
1432 static constexpr int kF32SignBit = 1 << 31;
1433 Movd(kScratchRegister, lhs);
1434 andl(kScratchRegister, Immediate(~kF32SignBit));
1435 Movd(liftoff::kScratchRegister2, rhs);
1436 andl(liftoff::kScratchRegister2, Immediate(kF32SignBit));
1437 orl(kScratchRegister, liftoff::kScratchRegister2);
1438 Movd(dst, kScratchRegister);
1439}
1440
1441void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32_abs(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister src) {
1442 static constexpr uint32_t kSignBit = uint32_t{1} << 31;
1443 if (dst == src) {
1444 TurboAssembler::Move(kScratchDoubleReg, kSignBit - 1);
1445 Andps(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
1446 } else {
1447 TurboAssembler::Move(dst, kSignBit - 1);
1448 Andps(dst, src);
1449 }
1450}
1451
1452void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32_neg(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister src) {
1453 static constexpr uint32_t kSignBit = uint32_t{1} << 31;
1454 if (dst == src) {
1455 TurboAssembler::Move(kScratchDoubleReg, kSignBit);
1456 Xorps(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
1457 } else {
1458 TurboAssembler::Move(dst, kSignBit);
1459 Xorps(dst, src);
1460 }
1461}
1462
1463bool LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32_ceil(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister src) {
1464 RETURN_FALSE_IF_MISSING_CPU_FEATURE(SSE4_1);
1465 Roundss(dst, src, kRoundUp);
1466 return true;
1467}
1468
1469bool LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32_floor(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister src) {
1470 RETURN_FALSE_IF_MISSING_CPU_FEATURE(SSE4_1);
1471 Roundss(dst, src, kRoundDown);
1472 return true;
1473}
1474
1475bool LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32_trunc(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister src) {
1476 RETURN_FALSE_IF_MISSING_CPU_FEATURE(SSE4_1);
1477 Roundss(dst, src, kRoundToZero);
1478 return true;
1479}
1480
1481bool LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32_nearest_int(DoubleRegister dst,
1482 DoubleRegister src) {
1483 RETURN_FALSE_IF_MISSING_CPU_FEATURE(SSE4_1);
1484 Roundss(dst, src, kRoundToNearest);
1485 return true;
1486}
1487
1488void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32_sqrt(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister src) {
1489 Sqrtss(dst, src);
1490}
1491
1492void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64_add(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister lhs,
1493 DoubleRegister rhs) {
1494 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
1495 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
1496 vaddsd(dst, lhs, rhs);
1497 } else if (dst == rhs) {
1498 addsd(dst, lhs);
1499 } else {
1500 if (dst != lhs) movsd(dst, lhs);
1501 addsd(dst, rhs);
1502 }
1503}
1504
1505void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64_sub(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister lhs,
1506 DoubleRegister rhs) {
1507 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
1508 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
1509 vsubsd(dst, lhs, rhs);
1510 } else if (dst == rhs) {
1511 movsd(kScratchDoubleReg, rhs);
1512 movsd(dst, lhs);
1513 subsd(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
1514 } else {
1515 if (dst != lhs) movsd(dst, lhs);
1516 subsd(dst, rhs);
1517 }
1518}
1519
1520void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64_mul(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister lhs,
1521 DoubleRegister rhs) {
1522 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
1523 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
1524 vmulsd(dst, lhs, rhs);
1525 } else if (dst == rhs) {
1526 mulsd(dst, lhs);
1527 } else {
1528 if (dst != lhs) movsd(dst, lhs);
1529 mulsd(dst, rhs);
1530 }
1531}
1532
1533void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64_div(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister lhs,
1534 DoubleRegister rhs) {
1535 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
1536 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
1537 vdivsd(dst, lhs, rhs);
1538 } else if (dst == rhs) {
1539 movsd(kScratchDoubleReg, rhs);
1540 movsd(dst, lhs);
1541 divsd(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
1542 } else {
1543 if (dst != lhs) movsd(dst, lhs);
1544 divsd(dst, rhs);
1545 }
1546}
1547
1548void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64_min(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister lhs,
1549 DoubleRegister rhs) {
1550 liftoff::EmitFloatMinOrMax<double>(this, dst, lhs, rhs,
1551 liftoff::MinOrMax::kMin);
1552}
1553
1554void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64_copysign(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister lhs,
1555 DoubleRegister rhs) {
1556 // Extract sign bit from {rhs} into {kScratchRegister2}.
1557 Movq(liftoff::kScratchRegister2, rhs);
1558 shrq(liftoff::kScratchRegister2, Immediate(63));
1559 shlq(liftoff::kScratchRegister2, Immediate(63));
1560 // Reset sign bit of {lhs} (in {kScratchRegister}).
1561 Movq(kScratchRegister, lhs);
1562 btrq(kScratchRegister, Immediate(63));
1563 // Combine both values into {kScratchRegister} and move into {dst}.
1564 orq(kScratchRegister, liftoff::kScratchRegister2);
1565 Movq(dst, kScratchRegister);
1566}
1567
1568void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64_max(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister lhs,
1569 DoubleRegister rhs) {
1570 liftoff::EmitFloatMinOrMax<double>(this, dst, lhs, rhs,
1571 liftoff::MinOrMax::kMax);
1572}
1573
1574void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64_abs(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister src) {
1575 static constexpr uint64_t kSignBit = uint64_t{1} << 63;
1576 if (dst == src) {
1577 TurboAssembler::Move(kScratchDoubleReg, kSignBit - 1);
1578 Andpd(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
1579 } else {
1580 TurboAssembler::Move(dst, kSignBit - 1);
1581 Andpd(dst, src);
1582 }
1583}
1584
1585void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64_neg(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister src) {
1586 static constexpr uint64_t kSignBit = uint64_t{1} << 63;
1587 if (dst == src) {
1588 TurboAssembler::Move(kScratchDoubleReg, kSignBit);
1589 Xorpd(dst, kScratchDoubleReg);
1590 } else {
1591 TurboAssembler::Move(dst, kSignBit);
1592 Xorpd(dst, src);
1593 }
1594}
1595
1596bool LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64_ceil(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister src) {
1597 RETURN_FALSE_IF_MISSING_CPU_FEATURE(SSE4_1);
1598 Roundsd(dst, src, kRoundUp);
1599 return true;
1600}
1601
1602bool LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64_floor(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister src) {
1603 RETURN_FALSE_IF_MISSING_CPU_FEATURE(SSE4_1);
1604 Roundsd(dst, src, kRoundDown);
1605 return true;
1606}
1607
1608bool LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64_trunc(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister src) {
1609 RETURN_FALSE_IF_MISSING_CPU_FEATURE(SSE4_1);
1610 Roundsd(dst, src, kRoundToZero);
1611 return true;
1612}
1613
1614bool LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64_nearest_int(DoubleRegister dst,
1615 DoubleRegister src) {
1616 RETURN_FALSE_IF_MISSING_CPU_FEATURE(SSE4_1);
1617 Roundsd(dst, src, kRoundToNearest);
1618 return true;
1619}
1620
1621void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64_sqrt(DoubleRegister dst, DoubleRegister src) {
1622 Sqrtsd(dst, src);
1623}
1624
1625namespace liftoff {
1626#define __ assm->
1627// Used for float to int conversions. If the value in {converted_back} equals
1628// {src} afterwards, the conversion succeeded.
1629template <typename dst_type, typename src_type>
1630inline void ConvertFloatToIntAndBack(LiftoffAssembler* assm, Register dst,
1631 DoubleRegister src,
1632 DoubleRegister converted_back) {
1633 if (std::is_same<double, src_type>::value) { // f64
1634 if (std::is_same<int32_t, dst_type>::value) { // f64 -> i32
1635 __ Cvttsd2si(dst, src);
1636 __ Cvtlsi2sd(converted_back, dst);
1637 } else if (std::is_same<uint32_t, dst_type>::value) { // f64 -> u32
1638 __ Cvttsd2siq(dst, src);
1639 __ movl(dst, dst);
1640 __ Cvtqsi2sd(converted_back, dst);
1641 } else if (std::is_same<int64_t, dst_type>::value) { // f64 -> i64
1642 __ Cvttsd2siq(dst, src);
1643 __ Cvtqsi2sd(converted_back, dst);
1644 } else {
1645 UNREACHABLE()V8_Fatal("unreachable code");
1646 }
1647 } else { // f32
1648 if (std::is_same<int32_t, dst_type>::value) { // f32 -> i32
1649 __ Cvttss2si(dst, src);
1650 __ Cvtlsi2ss(converted_back, dst);
1651 } else if (std::is_same<uint32_t, dst_type>::value) { // f32 -> u32
1652 __ Cvttss2siq(dst, src);
1653 __ movl(dst, dst);
1654 __ Cvtqsi2ss(converted_back, dst);
1655 } else if (std::is_same<int64_t, dst_type>::value) { // f32 -> i64
1656 __ Cvttss2siq(dst, src);
1657 __ Cvtqsi2ss(converted_back, dst);
1658 } else {
1659 UNREACHABLE()V8_Fatal("unreachable code");
1660 }
1661 }
1662}
1663
1664template <typename dst_type, typename src_type>
1665inline bool EmitTruncateFloatToInt(LiftoffAssembler* assm, Register dst,
1666 DoubleRegister src, Label* trap) {
1667 if (!CpuFeatures::IsSupported(SSE4_1)) {
1668 __ bailout(kMissingCPUFeature, "no SSE4.1");
1669 return true;
1670 }
1671 CpuFeatureScope feature(assm, SSE4_1);
1672
1673 DoubleRegister rounded = kScratchDoubleReg;
1674 DoubleRegister converted_back = kScratchDoubleReg2;
1675
1676 if (std::is_same<double, src_type>::value) { // f64
1677 __ Roundsd(rounded, src, kRoundToZero);
1678 } else { // f32
1679 __ Roundss(rounded, src, kRoundToZero);
1680 }
1681 ConvertFloatToIntAndBack<dst_type, src_type>(assm, dst, rounded,
1682 converted_back);
1683 if (std::is_same<double, src_type>::value) { // f64
1684 __ Ucomisd(converted_back, rounded);
1685 } else { // f32
1686 __ Ucomiss(converted_back, rounded);
1687 }
1688
1689 // Jump to trap if PF is 0 (one of the operands was NaN) or they are not
1690 // equal.
1691 __ j(parity_even, trap);
1692 __ j(not_equal, trap);
1693 return true;
1694}
1695
1696template <typename dst_type, typename src_type>
1697inline bool EmitSatTruncateFloatToInt(LiftoffAssembler* assm, Register dst,
1698 DoubleRegister src) {
1699 if (!CpuFeatures::IsSupported(SSE4_1)) {
1700 __ bailout(kMissingCPUFeature, "no SSE4.1");
1701 return true;
1702 }
1703 CpuFeatureScope feature(assm, SSE4_1);
1704
1705 Label done;
1706 Label not_nan;
1707 Label src_positive;
1708
1709 DoubleRegister rounded = kScratchDoubleReg;
1710 DoubleRegister converted_back = kScratchDoubleReg2;
1711 DoubleRegister zero_reg = kScratchDoubleReg;
1712
1713 if (std::is_same<double, src_type>::value) { // f64
1714 __ Roundsd(rounded, src, kRoundToZero);
1715 } else { // f32
1716 __ Roundss(rounded, src, kRoundToZero);
1717 }
1718
1719 ConvertFloatToIntAndBack<dst_type, src_type>(assm, dst, rounded,
1720 converted_back);
1721 if (std::is_same<double, src_type>::value) { // f64
1722 __ Ucomisd(converted_back, rounded);
1723 } else { // f32
1724 __ Ucomiss(converted_back, rounded);
1725 }
1726
1727 // Return 0 if PF is 0 (one of the operands was NaN)
1728 __ j(parity_odd, &not_nan);
1729 __ xorl(dst, dst);
1730 __ jmp(&done);
1731
1732 __ bind(&not_nan);
1733 // If rounding is as expected, return result
1734 __ j(equal, &done);
1735
1736 __ xorpd(zero_reg, zero_reg);
1737
1738 // if out-of-bounds, check if src is positive
1739 if (std::is_same<double, src_type>::value) { // f64
1740 __ Ucomisd(src, zero_reg);
1741 } else { // f32
1742 __ Ucomiss(src, zero_reg);
1743 }
1744 __ j(above, &src_positive);
1745 if (std::is_same<int32_t, dst_type>::value ||
1746 std::is_same<uint32_t, dst_type>::value) { // i32
1747 __ movl(
1748 dst,
1749 Immediate(static_cast<int32_t>(std::numeric_limits<dst_type>::min())));
1750 } else if (std::is_same<int64_t, dst_type>::value) { // i64s
1751 __ movq(dst, Immediate64(std::numeric_limits<dst_type>::min()));
1752 } else {
1753 UNREACHABLE()V8_Fatal("unreachable code");
1754 }
1755 __ jmp(&done);
1756
1757 __ bind(&src_positive);
1758 if (std::is_same<int32_t, dst_type>::value ||
1759 std::is_same<uint32_t, dst_type>::value) { // i32
1760 __ movl(
1761 dst,
1762 Immediate(static_cast<int32_t>(std::numeric_limits<dst_type>::max())));
1763 } else if (std::is_same<int64_t, dst_type>::value) { // i64s
1764 __ movq(dst, Immediate64(std::numeric_limits<dst_type>::max()));
1765 } else {
1766 UNREACHABLE()V8_Fatal("unreachable code");
1767 }
1768
1769 __ bind(&done);
1770 return true;
1771}
1772
1773template <typename src_type>
1774inline bool EmitSatTruncateFloatToUInt64(LiftoffAssembler* assm, Register dst,
1775 DoubleRegister src) {
1776 if (!CpuFeatures::IsSupported(SSE4_1)) {
1777 __ bailout(kMissingCPUFeature, "no SSE4.1");
1778 return true;
1779 }
1780 CpuFeatureScope feature(assm, SSE4_1);
1781
1782 Label done;
1783 Label neg_or_nan;
1784 Label overflow;
1785
1786 DoubleRegister zero_reg = kScratchDoubleReg;
1787
1788 __ xorpd(zero_reg, zero_reg);
1789 if (std::is_same<double, src_type>::value) { // f64
1790 __ Ucomisd(src, zero_reg);
1791 } else { // f32
1792 __ Ucomiss(src, zero_reg);
1793 }
1794 // Check if NaN
1795 __ j(parity_even, &neg_or_nan);
1796 __ j(below, &neg_or_nan);
1797 if (std::is_same<double, src_type>::value) { // f64
1798 __ Cvttsd2uiq(dst, src, &overflow);
1799 } else { // f32
1800 __ Cvttss2uiq(dst, src, &overflow);
1801 }
1802 __ jmp(&done);
1803
1804 __ bind(&neg_or_nan);
1805 __ movq(dst, zero_reg);
1806 __ jmp(&done);
1807
1808 __ bind(&overflow);
1809 __ movq(dst, Immediate64(std::numeric_limits<uint64_t>::max()));
1810 __ bind(&done);
1811 return true;
1812}
1813#undef __
1814} // namespace liftoff
1815
1816bool LiftoffAssembler::emit_type_conversion(WasmOpcode opcode,
1817 LiftoffRegister dst,
1818 LiftoffRegister src, Label* trap) {
1819 switch (opcode) {
1820 case kExprI32ConvertI64:
1821 movl(dst.gp(), src.gp());
1822 return true;
1823 case kExprI32SConvertF32:
1824 return liftoff::EmitTruncateFloatToInt<int32_t, float>(this, dst.gp(),
1825 src.fp(), trap);
1826 case kExprI32UConvertF32:
1827 return liftoff::EmitTruncateFloatToInt<uint32_t, float>(this, dst.gp(),
1828 src.fp(), trap);
1829 case kExprI32SConvertF64:
1830 return liftoff::EmitTruncateFloatToInt<int32_t, double>(this, dst.gp(),
1831 src.fp(), trap);
1832 case kExprI32UConvertF64:
1833 return liftoff::EmitTruncateFloatToInt<uint32_t, double>(this, dst.gp(),
1834 src.fp(), trap);
1835 case kExprI32SConvertSatF32:
1836 return liftoff::EmitSatTruncateFloatToInt<int32_t, float>(this, dst.gp(),
1837 src.fp());
1838 case kExprI32UConvertSatF32:
1839 return liftoff::EmitSatTruncateFloatToInt<uint32_t, float>(this, dst.gp(),
1840 src.fp());
1841 case kExprI32SConvertSatF64:
1842 return liftoff::EmitSatTruncateFloatToInt<int32_t, double>(this, dst.gp(),
1843 src.fp());
1844 case kExprI32UConvertSatF64:
1845 return liftoff::EmitSatTruncateFloatToInt<uint32_t, double>(
1846 this, dst.gp(), src.fp());
1847 case kExprI32ReinterpretF32:
1848 Movd(dst.gp(), src.fp());
1849 return true;
1850 case kExprI64SConvertI32:
1851 movsxlq(dst.gp(), src.gp());
1852 return true;
1853 case kExprI64SConvertF32:
1854 return liftoff::EmitTruncateFloatToInt<int64_t, float>(this, dst.gp(),
1855 src.fp(), trap);
1856 case kExprI64UConvertF32: {
1857 RETURN_FALSE_IF_MISSING_CPU_FEATURE(SSE4_1);
1858 Cvttss2uiq(dst.gp(), src.fp(), trap);
1859 return true;
1860 }
1861 case kExprI64SConvertF64:
1862 return liftoff::EmitTruncateFloatToInt<int64_t, double>(this, dst.gp(),
1863 src.fp(), trap);
1864 case kExprI64UConvertF64: {
1865 RETURN_FALSE_IF_MISSING_CPU_FEATURE(SSE4_1);
1866 Cvttsd2uiq(dst.gp(), src.fp(), trap);
1867 return true;
1868 }
1869 case kExprI64SConvertSatF32:
1870 return liftoff::EmitSatTruncateFloatToInt<int64_t, float>(this, dst.gp(),
1871 src.fp());
1872 case kExprI64UConvertSatF32: {
1873 return liftoff::EmitSatTruncateFloatToUInt64<float>(this, dst.gp(),
1874 src.fp());
1875 }
1876 case kExprI64SConvertSatF64:
1877 return liftoff::EmitSatTruncateFloatToInt<int64_t, double>(this, dst.gp(),
1878 src.fp());
1879 case kExprI64UConvertSatF64: {
1880 return liftoff::EmitSatTruncateFloatToUInt64<double>(this, dst.gp(),
1881 src.fp());
1882 }
1883 case kExprI64UConvertI32:
1884 AssertZeroExtended(src.gp());
1885 if (dst.gp() != src.gp()) movl(dst.gp(), src.gp());
1886 return true;
1887 case kExprI64ReinterpretF64:
1888 Movq(dst.gp(), src.fp());
1889 return true;
1890 case kExprF32SConvertI32:
1891 Cvtlsi2ss(dst.fp(), src.gp());
1892 return true;
1893 case kExprF32UConvertI32:
1894 movl(kScratchRegister, src.gp());
1895 Cvtqsi2ss(dst.fp(), kScratchRegister);
1896 return true;
1897 case kExprF32SConvertI64:
1898 Cvtqsi2ss(dst.fp(), src.gp());
1899 return true;
1900 case kExprF32UConvertI64:
1901 Cvtqui2ss(dst.fp(), src.gp());
1902 return true;
1903 case kExprF32ConvertF64:
1904 Cvtsd2ss(dst.fp(), src.fp());
1905 return true;
1906 case kExprF32ReinterpretI32:
1907 Movd(dst.fp(), src.gp());
1908 return true;
1909 case kExprF64SConvertI32:
1910 Cvtlsi2sd(dst.fp(), src.gp());
1911 return true;
1912 case kExprF64UConvertI32:
1913 movl(kScratchRegister, src.gp());
1914 Cvtqsi2sd(dst.fp(), kScratchRegister);
1915 return true;
1916 case kExprF64SConvertI64:
1917 Cvtqsi2sd(dst.fp(), src.gp());
1918 return true;
1919 case kExprF64UConvertI64:
1920 Cvtqui2sd(dst.fp(), src.gp());
1921 return true;
1922 case kExprF64ConvertF32:
1923 Cvtss2sd(dst.fp(), src.fp());
1924 return true;
1925 case kExprF64ReinterpretI64:
1926 Movq(dst.fp(), src.gp());
1927 return true;
1928 default:
1929 UNREACHABLE()V8_Fatal("unreachable code");
1930 }
1931}
1932
1933void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32_signextend_i8(Register dst, Register src) {
1934 movsxbl(dst, src);
1935}
1936
1937void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32_signextend_i16(Register dst, Register src) {
1938 movsxwl(dst, src);
1939}
1940
1941void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_signextend_i8(LiftoffRegister dst,
1942 LiftoffRegister src) {
1943 movsxbq(dst.gp(), src.gp());
1944}
1945
1946void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_signextend_i16(LiftoffRegister dst,
1947 LiftoffRegister src) {
1948 movsxwq(dst.gp(), src.gp());
1949}
1950
1951void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_signextend_i32(LiftoffRegister dst,
1952 LiftoffRegister src) {
1953 movsxlq(dst.gp(), src.gp());
1954}
1955
1956void LiftoffAssembler::emit_jump(Label* label) { jmp(label); }
1957
1958void LiftoffAssembler::emit_jump(Register target) { jmp(target); }
1959
1960void LiftoffAssembler::emit_cond_jump(Condition cond, Label* label,
1961 ValueType type, Register lhs,
1962 Register rhs) {
1963 if (rhs != no_reg) {
1964 switch (type.kind()) {
1965 case ValueType::kI32:
1966 cmpl(lhs, rhs);
1967 break;
1968 case ValueType::kI64:
1969 cmpq(lhs, rhs);
1970 break;
1971 default:
1972 UNREACHABLE()V8_Fatal("unreachable code");
1973 }
1974 } else {
1975 DCHECK_EQ(type, kWasmI32)((void) 0);
1976 testl(lhs, lhs);
1977 }
1978
1979 j(cond, label);
1980}
1981
1982void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32_eqz(Register dst, Register src) {
1983 testl(src, src);
1984 setcc(equal, dst);
1985 movzxbl(dst, dst);
1986}
1987
1988void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32_set_cond(Condition cond, Register dst,
1989 Register lhs, Register rhs) {
1990 cmpl(lhs, rhs);
1991 setcc(cond, dst);
1992 movzxbl(dst, dst);
1993}
1994
1995void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_eqz(Register dst, LiftoffRegister src) {
1996 testq(src.gp(), src.gp());
1997 setcc(equal, dst);
1998 movzxbl(dst, dst);
1999}
2000
2001void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64_set_cond(Condition cond, Register dst,
2002 LiftoffRegister lhs,
2003 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2004 cmpq(lhs.gp(), rhs.gp());
2005 setcc(cond, dst);
2006 movzxbl(dst, dst);
2007}
2008
2009namespace liftoff {
2010template <void (TurboAssembler::*cmp_op)(DoubleRegister, DoubleRegister)>
2011void EmitFloatSetCond(LiftoffAssembler* assm, Condition cond, Register dst,
2012 DoubleRegister lhs, DoubleRegister rhs) {
2013 Label cont;
2014 Label not_nan;
2015
2016 (assm->*cmp_op)(lhs, rhs);
2017 // If PF is one, one of the operands was NaN. This needs special handling.
2018 assm->j(parity_odd, &not_nan, Label::kNear);
2019 // Return 1 for f32.ne, 0 for all other cases.
2020 if (cond == not_equal) {
2021 assm->movl(dst, Immediate(1));
2022 } else {
2023 assm->xorl(dst, dst);
2024 }
2025 assm->jmp(&cont, Label::kNear);
2026 assm->bind(&not_nan);
2027
2028 assm->setcc(cond, dst);
2029 assm->movzxbl(dst, dst);
2030 assm->bind(&cont);
2031}
2032} // namespace liftoff
2033
2034void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32_set_cond(Condition cond, Register dst,
2035 DoubleRegister lhs,
2036 DoubleRegister rhs) {
2037 liftoff::EmitFloatSetCond<&TurboAssembler::Ucomiss>(this, cond, dst, lhs,
2038 rhs);
2039}
2040
2041void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64_set_cond(Condition cond, Register dst,
2042 DoubleRegister lhs,
2043 DoubleRegister rhs) {
2044 liftoff::EmitFloatSetCond<&TurboAssembler::Ucomisd>(this, cond, dst, lhs,
2045 rhs);
2046}
2047
2048bool LiftoffAssembler::emit_select(LiftoffRegister dst, Register condition,
2049 LiftoffRegister true_value,
2050 LiftoffRegister false_value,
2051 ValueType type) {
2052 if (type != kWasmI32 && type != kWasmI64) return false;
2053
2054 testl(condition, condition);
2055
2056 if (type == kWasmI32) {
2057 if (dst == false_value) {
2058 cmovl(not_zero, dst.gp(), true_value.gp());
2059 } else {
2060 if (dst != true_value) movl(dst.gp(), true_value.gp());
2061 cmovl(zero, dst.gp(), false_value.gp());
2062 }
2063 } else {
2064 if (dst == false_value) {
2065 cmovq(not_zero, dst.gp(), true_value.gp());
2066 } else {
2067 if (dst != true_value) movq(dst.gp(), true_value.gp());
2068 cmovq(zero, dst.gp(), false_value.gp());
2069 }
2070 }
2071
2072 return true;
2073}
2074
2075// TODO(fanchenk): Distinguish mov* if data bypass delay matter.
2076namespace liftoff {
2077template <void (Assembler::*avx_op)(XMMRegister, XMMRegister, XMMRegister),
2078 void (Assembler::*sse_op)(XMMRegister, XMMRegister)>
2079void EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp(
2080 LiftoffAssembler* assm, LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2081 LiftoffRegister rhs, base::Optional<CpuFeature> feature = base::nullopt) {
2082 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
2083 CpuFeatureScope scope(assm, AVX);
2084 (assm->*avx_op)(dst.fp(), lhs.fp(), rhs.fp());
2085 return;
2086 }
2087
2088 base::Optional<CpuFeatureScope> sse_scope;
2089 if (feature.has_value()) sse_scope.emplace(assm, *feature);
2090
2091 if (dst.fp() == rhs.fp()) {
2092 (assm->*sse_op)(dst.fp(), lhs.fp());
2093 } else {
2094 if (dst.fp() != lhs.fp()) (assm->movaps)(dst.fp(), lhs.fp());
2095 (assm->*sse_op)(dst.fp(), rhs.fp());
2096 }
2097}
2098
2099template <void (Assembler::*avx_op)(XMMRegister, XMMRegister, XMMRegister),
2100 void (Assembler::*sse_op)(XMMRegister, XMMRegister)>
2101void EmitSimdNonCommutativeBinOp(
2102 LiftoffAssembler* assm, LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2103 LiftoffRegister rhs, base::Optional<CpuFeature> feature = base::nullopt) {
2104 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
2105 CpuFeatureScope scope(assm, AVX);
2106 (assm->*avx_op)(dst.fp(), lhs.fp(), rhs.fp());
2107 return;
2108 }
2109
2110 base::Optional<CpuFeatureScope> sse_scope;
2111 if (feature.has_value()) sse_scope.emplace(assm, *feature);
2112
2113 if (dst.fp() == rhs.fp()) {
2114 assm->movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, rhs.fp());
2115 assm->movaps(dst.fp(), lhs.fp());
2116 (assm->*sse_op)(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2117 } else {
2118 if (dst.fp() != lhs.fp()) assm->movaps(dst.fp(), lhs.fp());
2119 (assm->*sse_op)(dst.fp(), rhs.fp());
2120 }
2121}
2122
2123template <void (Assembler::*avx_op)(XMMRegister, XMMRegister, XMMRegister),
2124 void (Assembler::*sse_op)(XMMRegister, XMMRegister), uint8_t width>
2125void EmitSimdShiftOp(LiftoffAssembler* assm, LiftoffRegister dst,
2126 LiftoffRegister operand, LiftoffRegister count) {
2127 constexpr int mask = (1 << width) - 1;
2128 assm->movq(kScratchRegister, count.gp());
2129 assm->andq(kScratchRegister, Immediate(mask));
2130 assm->Movq(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchRegister);
2131 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
2132 CpuFeatureScope scope(assm, AVX);
2133 (assm->*avx_op)(dst.fp(), operand.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2134 } else {
2135 if (dst.fp() != operand.fp()) assm->movaps(dst.fp(), operand.fp());
2136 (assm->*sse_op)(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2137 }
2138}
2139
2140template <void (Assembler::*avx_op)(XMMRegister, XMMRegister, byte),
2141 void (Assembler::*sse_op)(XMMRegister, byte), uint8_t width>
2142void EmitSimdShiftOpImm(LiftoffAssembler* assm, LiftoffRegister dst,
2143 LiftoffRegister operand, int32_t count) {
2144 constexpr int mask = (1 << width) - 1;
2145 byte shift = static_cast<byte>(count & mask);
2146 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
2147 CpuFeatureScope scope(assm, AVX);
2148 (assm->*avx_op)(dst.fp(), operand.fp(), shift);
2149 } else {
2150 if (dst.fp() != operand.fp()) assm->movaps(dst.fp(), operand.fp());
2151 (assm->*sse_op)(dst.fp(), shift);
2152 }
2153}
2154
2155template <bool is_signed>
2156void EmitI8x16Shr(LiftoffAssembler* assm, LiftoffRegister dst,
2157 LiftoffRegister lhs, LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2158 // Same algorithm as the one in code-generator-x64.cc.
2159 assm->Punpckhbw(kScratchDoubleReg, lhs.fp());
2160 assm->Punpcklbw(dst.fp(), lhs.fp());
2161 // Prepare shift value
2162 assm->movq(kScratchRegister, rhs.gp());
2163 // Take shift value modulo 8.
2164 assm->andq(kScratchRegister, Immediate(7));
2165 assm->addq(kScratchRegister, Immediate(8));
2166 assm->Movq(liftoff::kScratchDoubleReg2, kScratchRegister);
2167 if (is_signed) {
2168 assm->Psraw(kScratchDoubleReg, liftoff::kScratchDoubleReg2);
2169 assm->Psraw(dst.fp(), liftoff::kScratchDoubleReg2);
2170 assm->Packsswb(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2171 } else {
2172 assm->Psrlw(kScratchDoubleReg, liftoff::kScratchDoubleReg2);
2173 assm->Psrlw(dst.fp(), liftoff::kScratchDoubleReg2);
2174 assm->Packuswb(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2175 }
2176}
2177
2178// Can be used by both the immediate and register version of the shifts. psraq
2179// is only available in AVX512, so we can't use it yet.
2180template <typename ShiftOperand>
2181void EmitI64x2ShrS(LiftoffAssembler* assm, LiftoffRegister dst,
2182 LiftoffRegister lhs, ShiftOperand rhs,
2183 bool shift_is_rcx = false) {
2184 bool restore_rcx = false;
2185 Register backup = kScratchRegister2;
2186 if (!shift_is_rcx) {
2187 if (assm->cache_state()->is_used(LiftoffRegister(rcx))) {
2188 restore_rcx = true;
2189 assm->movq(backup, rcx);
2190 }
2191 assm->movl(rcx, rhs);
2192 }
2193
2194 Register tmp = kScratchRegister;
2195
2196 assm->Pextrq(tmp, lhs.fp(), int8_t{0x0});
2197 assm->sarq_cl(tmp);
2198 assm->Pinsrq(dst.fp(), tmp, int8_t{0x0});
2199
2200 assm->Pextrq(tmp, lhs.fp(), int8_t{0x1});
2201 assm->sarq_cl(tmp);
2202 assm->Pinsrq(dst.fp(), tmp, int8_t{0x1});
2203
2204 // restore rcx.
2205 if (restore_rcx) {
2206 assm->movq(rcx, backup);
2207 }
2208}
2209
2210inline void EmitAnyTrue(LiftoffAssembler* assm, LiftoffRegister dst,
2211 LiftoffRegister src) {
2212 assm->xorq(dst.gp(), dst.gp());
2213 assm->Ptest(src.fp(), src.fp());
2214 assm->setcc(not_equal, dst.gp());
2215}
2216
2217template <void (TurboAssembler::*pcmp)(XMMRegister, XMMRegister)>
2218inline void EmitAllTrue(LiftoffAssembler* assm, LiftoffRegister dst,
2219 LiftoffRegister src) {
2220 XMMRegister tmp = kScratchDoubleReg;
2221 assm->xorq(dst.gp(), dst.gp());
2222 assm->Pxor(tmp, tmp);
2223 (assm->*pcmp)(tmp, src.fp());
2224 assm->Ptest(tmp, tmp);
2225 assm->setcc(equal, dst.gp());
2226}
2227
2228} // namespace liftoff
2229
2230void LiftoffAssembler::LoadTransform(LiftoffRegister dst, Register src_addr,
2231 Register offset_reg, uint32_t offset_imm,
2232 LoadType type,
2233 LoadTransformationKind transform,
2234 uint32_t* protected_load_pc) {
2235 if (emit_debug_code() && offset_reg != no_reg) {
2236 AssertZeroExtended(offset_reg);
2237 }
2238 Operand src_op = liftoff::GetMemOp(this, src_addr, offset_reg, offset_imm);
2239 *protected_load_pc = pc_offset();
2240 MachineType memtype = type.mem_type();
2241 if (transform == LoadTransformationKind::kExtend) {
2242 if (memtype == MachineType::Int8()) {
2243 Pmovsxbw(dst.fp(), src_op);
2244 } else if (memtype == MachineType::Uint8()) {
2245 Pmovzxbw(dst.fp(), src_op);
2246 } else if (memtype == MachineType::Int16()) {
2247 Pmovsxwd(dst.fp(), src_op);
2248 } else if (memtype == MachineType::Uint16()) {
2249 Pmovzxwd(dst.fp(), src_op);
2250 } else if (memtype == MachineType::Int32()) {
2251 Pmovsxdq(dst.fp(), src_op);
2252 } else if (memtype == MachineType::Uint32()) {
2253 Pmovzxdq(dst.fp(), src_op);
2254 }
2255 } else {
2256 DCHECK_EQ(LoadTransformationKind::kSplat, transform)((void) 0);
2257 if (memtype == MachineType::Int8()) {
2258 Pinsrb(dst.fp(), src_op, 0);
2259 Pxor(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
2260 Pshufb(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2261 } else if (memtype == MachineType::Int16()) {
2262 Pinsrw(dst.fp(), src_op, 0);
2263 Pshuflw(dst.fp(), dst.fp(), uint8_t{0});
2264 Punpcklqdq(dst.fp(), dst.fp());
2265 } else if (memtype == MachineType::Int32()) {
2266 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
2267 CpuFeatureScope avx_scope(this, AVX);
2268 vbroadcastss(dst.fp(), src_op);
2269 } else {
2270 Movss(dst.fp(), src_op);
2271 Shufps(dst.fp(), dst.fp(), byte{0});
2272 }
2273 } else if (memtype == MachineType::Int64()) {
2274 Movddup(dst.fp(), src_op);
2275 }
2276 }
2277}
2278
2279void LiftoffAssembler::emit_s8x16_shuffle(LiftoffRegister dst,
2280 LiftoffRegister lhs,
2281 LiftoffRegister rhs,
2282 const uint8_t shuffle[16],
2283 bool is_swizzle) {
2284 if (is_swizzle) {
2285 uint32_t imms[4];
2286 // Shuffles that use just 1 operand are called swizzles, rhs can be ignored.
2287 wasm::SimdShuffle::Pack16Lanes(imms, shuffle);
2288 TurboAssembler::Move(kScratchDoubleReg, make_uint64(imms[3], imms[2]),
2289 make_uint64(imms[1], imms[0]));
2290 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
2291 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
2292 vpshufb(dst.fp(), lhs.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2293 } else {
2294 if (dst != lhs) {
2295 movups(dst.fp(), lhs.fp());
2296 }
2297 pshufb(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2298 }
2299 return;
2300 }
2301
2302 LiftoffRegister tmp_simd =
2303 GetUnusedRegister(kFpReg, LiftoffRegList::ForRegs(dst, lhs, rhs));
2304 Movups(kScratchDoubleReg, lhs.fp());
2305
2306 uint64_t mask1[2] = {};
2307 for (int i = 15; i >= 0; i--) {
2308 uint8_t lane = shuffle[i];
2309 int j = i >> 3;
2310 mask1[j] <<= 8;
2311 mask1[j] |= lane < kSimd128Size ? lane : 0x80;
2312 }
2313 TurboAssembler::Move(tmp_simd.fp(), mask1[0]);
2314 movq(kScratchRegister, mask1[1]);
2315 Pinsrq(tmp_simd.fp(), kScratchRegister, int8_t{1});
2316 Pshufb(kScratchDoubleReg, tmp_simd.fp());
2317
2318 uint64_t mask2[2] = {};
2319 for (int i = 15; i >= 0; i--) {
2320 uint8_t lane = shuffle[i];
2321 int j = i >> 3;
2322 mask2[j] <<= 8;
2323 mask2[j] |= lane >= kSimd128Size ? (lane & 0x0F) : 0x80;
2324 }
2325 TurboAssembler::Move(tmp_simd.fp(), mask2[0]);
2326 movq(kScratchRegister, mask2[1]);
2327 Pinsrq(tmp_simd.fp(), kScratchRegister, int8_t{1});
2328
2329 if (dst.fp() != rhs.fp()) {
2330 Movups(dst.fp(), rhs.fp());
2331 }
2332 Pshufb(dst.fp(), tmp_simd.fp());
2333 Por(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2334}
2335
2336void LiftoffAssembler::emit_s8x16_swizzle(LiftoffRegister dst,
2337 LiftoffRegister lhs,
2338 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2339 XMMRegister mask =
2340 GetUnusedRegister(kFpReg, LiftoffRegList::ForRegs(lhs, rhs)).fp();
2341 // Out-of-range indices should return 0, add 112 (0x70) so that any value > 15
2342 // saturates to 128 (top bit set), so pshufb will zero that lane.
2343 TurboAssembler::Move(mask, uint32_t{0x70707070});
2344 Pshufd(mask, mask, uint8_t{0x0});
2345 Paddusb(mask, rhs.fp());
2346 if (lhs != dst) {
2347 Movaps(dst.fp(), lhs.fp());
2348 }
2349 Pshufb(dst.fp(), mask);
2350}
2351
2352void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_splat(LiftoffRegister dst,
2353 LiftoffRegister src) {
2354 Movd(dst.fp(), src.gp());
2355 Pxor(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
2356 Pshufb(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2357}
2358
2359void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i16x8_splat(LiftoffRegister dst,
2360 LiftoffRegister src) {
2361 Movd(dst.fp(), src.gp());
2362 Pshuflw(dst.fp(), dst.fp(), static_cast<uint8_t>(0));
2363 Pshufd(dst.fp(), dst.fp(), static_cast<uint8_t>(0));
2364}
2365
2366void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32x4_splat(LiftoffRegister dst,
2367 LiftoffRegister src) {
2368 Movd(dst.fp(), src.gp());
2369 Pshufd(dst.fp(), dst.fp(), static_cast<uint8_t>(0));
2370}
2371
2372void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64x2_splat(LiftoffRegister dst,
2373 LiftoffRegister src) {
2374 Movq(dst.fp(), src.gp());
2375 Movddup(dst.fp(), dst.fp());
2376}
2377
2378void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32x4_splat(LiftoffRegister dst,
2379 LiftoffRegister src) {
2380 if (dst.fp() != src.fp()) {
2381 Movss(dst.fp(), src.fp());
2382 }
2383 Shufps(dst.fp(), src.fp(), static_cast<byte>(0));
2384}
2385
2386void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64x2_splat(LiftoffRegister dst,
2387 LiftoffRegister src) {
2388 Movddup(dst.fp(), src.fp());
2389}
2390
2391void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_eq(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2392 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2393 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpcmpeqb, &Assembler::pcmpeqb>(
2394 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2395}
2396
2397void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_ne(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2398 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2399 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpcmpeqb, &Assembler::pcmpeqb>(
2400 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2401 Pcmpeqb(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
2402 Pxor(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2403}
2404
2405void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_gt_s(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2406 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2407 liftoff::EmitSimdNonCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpcmpgtb,
2408 &Assembler::pcmpgtb>(this, dst, lhs,
2409 rhs);
2410}
2411
2412void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_gt_u(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2413 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2414 DoubleRegister ref = rhs.fp();
2415 if (dst == rhs) {
2416 Movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, rhs.fp());
2417 ref = kScratchDoubleReg;
2418 }
2419 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpmaxub, &Assembler::pmaxub>(
2420 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2421 Pcmpeqb(dst.fp(), ref);
2422 Pcmpeqb(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
2423 Pxor(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2424}
2425
2426void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_ge_s(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2427 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2428 DoubleRegister ref = rhs.fp();
2429 if (dst == rhs) {
2430 Movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, rhs.fp());
2431 ref = kScratchDoubleReg;
2432 }
2433 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpminsb, &Assembler::pminsb>(
2434 this, dst, lhs, rhs, SSE4_1);
2435 Pcmpeqb(dst.fp(), ref);
2436}
2437
2438void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_ge_u(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2439 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2440 DoubleRegister ref = rhs.fp();
2441 if (dst == rhs) {
2442 Movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, rhs.fp());
2443 ref = kScratchDoubleReg;
2444 }
2445 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpminub, &Assembler::pminub>(
2446 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2447 Pcmpeqb(dst.fp(), ref);
2448}
2449
2450void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i16x8_eq(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2451 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2452 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpcmpeqw, &Assembler::pcmpeqw>(
2453 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2454}
2455
2456void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i16x8_ne(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2457 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2458 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpcmpeqw, &Assembler::pcmpeqw>(
2459 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2460 Pcmpeqw(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
2461 Pxor(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2462}
2463

2465 LiftoffRegister rhs) {

2467 &Assembler::pcmpgtw>(this, dst, lhs,
2468 rhs);
2469}
2470
2471void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i16x8_gt_u(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2472 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2473 DoubleRegister ref = rhs.fp();
2474 if (dst == rhs) {
2475 Movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, rhs.fp());
2476 ref = kScratchDoubleReg;
2477 }
2478 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpmaxuw, &Assembler::pmaxuw>(
2479 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2480 Pcmpeqw(dst.fp(), ref);
2481 Pcmpeqw(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
2482 Pxor(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2483}
2484
2485void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i16x8_ge_s(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2486 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2487 DoubleRegister ref = rhs.fp();
2488 if (dst == rhs) {
2489 Movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, rhs.fp());
2490 ref = kScratchDoubleReg;
2491 }

2493 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2494 Pcmpeqw(dst.fp(), ref);
2495}
2496

2498 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2499 DoubleRegister ref = rhs.fp();
2500 if (dst == rhs) {
2501 Movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, rhs.fp());
2502 ref = kScratchDoubleReg;
2503 }

2505 this, dst, lhs, rhs, SSE4_1);

2507}

2540 Pcmpeqd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);

2542}

2595 LiftoffRegister rhs) {

2597 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2598}

2600void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64x2_ne(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2601 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2602 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vcmpneqpd,
2603 &Assembler::cmpneqpd>(this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2604}
2605

2607 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2608 liftoff::EmitSimdNonCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vcmpltpd,
2609 &Assembler::cmpltpd>(this, dst, lhs,
2610 rhs);
2611}
2612
2613void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64x2_le(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2614 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2615 liftoff::EmitSimdNonCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vcmplepd,
2616 &Assembler::cmplepd>(this, dst, lhs,
2617 rhs);
2618}
2619
2620void LiftoffAssembler::emit_s128_const(LiftoffRegister dst,
2621 const uint8_t imms[16]) {
2622 uint64_t vals[2];
2623 memcpy(vals, imms, sizeof(vals));
2624 TurboAssembler::Move(dst.fp(), vals[0]);
2625 movq(kScratchRegister, vals[1]);
2626 Pinsrq(dst.fp(), kScratchRegister, int8_t{1});
2627}
2628
2629void LiftoffAssembler::emit_s128_not(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister src) {
2630 if (dst.fp() != src.fp()) {
2631 Pcmpeqd(dst.fp(), dst.fp());
2632 Pxor(dst.fp(), src.fp());
2633 } else {
2634 Pcmpeqd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
2635 Pxor(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2636 }
2637}
2638
2639void LiftoffAssembler::emit_s128_and(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2640 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2641 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpand, &Assembler::pand>(
2642 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2643}
2644
2645void LiftoffAssembler::emit_s128_or(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2646 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2647 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpor, &Assembler::por>(
2648 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2649}
2650
2651void LiftoffAssembler::emit_s128_xor(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2652 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2653 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpxor, &Assembler::pxor>(
2654 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2655}
2656
2657void LiftoffAssembler::emit_s128_select(LiftoffRegister dst,
2658 LiftoffRegister src1,
2659 LiftoffRegister src2,
2660 LiftoffRegister mask) {
2661 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
2662 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
2663 vxorps(kScratchDoubleReg, src1.fp(), src2.fp());
2664 vandps(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg, mask.fp());
2665 vxorps(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg, src2.fp());
2666 } else {
2667 movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, src1.fp());
2668 xorps(kScratchDoubleReg, src2.fp());
2669 andps(kScratchDoubleReg, mask.fp());
2670 if (dst.fp() != src2.fp()) movaps(dst.fp(), src2.fp());
2671 xorps(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2672 }
2673}
2674
2675void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_neg(LiftoffRegister dst,
2676 LiftoffRegister src) {
2677 if (dst.fp() == src.fp()) {
2678 Pcmpeqd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
2679 Psignb(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2680 } else {
2681 Pxor(dst.fp(), dst.fp());
2682 Psubb(dst.fp(), src.fp());
2683 }
2684}
2685
2686void LiftoffAssembler::emit_v8x16_anytrue(LiftoffRegister dst,
2687 LiftoffRegister src) {
2688 liftoff::EmitAnyTrue(this, dst, src);
2689}
2690
2691void LiftoffAssembler::emit_v8x16_alltrue(LiftoffRegister dst,
2692 LiftoffRegister src) {
2693 liftoff::EmitAllTrue<&TurboAssembler::Pcmpeqb>(this, dst, src);
2694}
2695
2696void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_bitmask(LiftoffRegister dst,
2697 LiftoffRegister src) {
2698 Pmovmskb(dst.gp(), src.fp());
2699}
2700
2701void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_shl(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2702 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2703 static constexpr RegClass tmp_simd_rc = reg_class_for(ValueType::kS128);
2704 LiftoffRegister tmp_simd =
2705 GetUnusedRegister(tmp_simd_rc, LiftoffRegList::ForRegs(dst, lhs));
2706 // Mask off the unwanted bits before word-shifting.
2707 Pcmpeqw(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
2708 movq(kScratchRegister, rhs.gp());
2709 andq(kScratchRegister, Immediate(7));
2710 addq(kScratchRegister, Immediate(8));
2711 Movq(tmp_simd.fp(), kScratchRegister);
2712 Psrlw(kScratchDoubleReg, tmp_simd.fp());
2713 Packuswb(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
2714
2715 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
2716 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
2717 vpand(dst.fp(), lhs.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2718 } else {
2719 if (dst.fp() != lhs.fp()) movaps(dst.fp(), lhs.fp());
2720 pand(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2721 }
2722 subq(kScratchRegister, Immediate(8));
2723 Movq(tmp_simd.fp(), kScratchRegister);
2724 Psllw(dst.fp(), tmp_simd.fp());
2725}
2726
2727void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_shli(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2728 int32_t rhs) {
2729 byte shift = static_cast<byte>(rhs & 0x7);
2730 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
2731 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
2732 vpsllw(dst.fp(), lhs.fp(), shift);
2733 } else {
2734 if (dst.fp() != lhs.fp()) movaps(dst.fp(), lhs.fp());
2735 psllw(dst.fp(), shift);
2736 }
2737
2738 uint8_t bmask = static_cast<uint8_t>(0xff << shift);
2739 uint32_t mask = bmask << 24 | bmask << 16 | bmask << 8 | bmask;
2740 movl(kScratchRegister, Immediate(mask));
2741 Movd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchRegister);
2742 Pshufd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg, uint8_t{0});
2743 Pand(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2744}
2745
2746void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_shr_s(LiftoffRegister dst,
2747 LiftoffRegister lhs,
2748 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2749 liftoff::EmitI8x16Shr</*is_signed=*/true>(this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2750}
2751
2752void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_shri_s(LiftoffRegister dst,
2753 LiftoffRegister lhs, int32_t rhs) {
2754 Punpckhbw(kScratchDoubleReg, lhs.fp());
2755 Punpcklbw(dst.fp(), lhs.fp());
2756 uint8_t shift = (rhs & 7) + 8;
2757 Psraw(kScratchDoubleReg, shift);
2758 Psraw(dst.fp(), shift);
2759 Packsswb(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2760}
2761
2762void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_shr_u(LiftoffRegister dst,
2763 LiftoffRegister lhs,
2764 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2765 liftoff::EmitI8x16Shr</*is_signed=*/false>(this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2766}
2767
2768void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_shri_u(LiftoffRegister dst,
2769 LiftoffRegister lhs, int32_t rhs) {
2770 // Perform 16-bit shift, then mask away high bits.
2771 uint8_t shift = rhs & 7; // i.InputInt3(1);
2772 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
2773 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
2774 vpsrlw(dst.fp(), lhs.fp(), byte{shift});
2775 } else if (dst != lhs) {
2776 Movaps(dst.fp(), lhs.fp());
2777 psrlw(dst.fp(), byte{shift});
2778 }
2779
2780 uint8_t bmask = 0xff >> shift;
2781 uint32_t mask = bmask << 24 | bmask << 16 | bmask << 8 | bmask;
2782 movl(kScratchRegister, Immediate(mask));
2783 Movd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchRegister);
2784 Pshufd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg, byte{0});
2785 Pand(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2786}
2787
2788void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_add(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2789 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2790 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpaddb, &Assembler::paddb>(
2791 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2792}
2793
2794void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_add_saturate_s(LiftoffRegister dst,
2795 LiftoffRegister lhs,
2796 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2797 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpaddsb, &Assembler::paddsb>(
2798 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2799}
2800
2801void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_add_saturate_u(LiftoffRegister dst,
2802 LiftoffRegister lhs,
2803 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2804 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpaddusb, &Assembler::paddusb>(
2805 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2806}
2807
2808void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_sub(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2809 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2810 liftoff::EmitSimdNonCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpsubb, &Assembler::psubb>(
2811 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2812}
2813
2814void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_sub_saturate_s(LiftoffRegister dst,
2815 LiftoffRegister lhs,
2816 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2817 liftoff::EmitSimdNonCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpsubsb, &Assembler::psubsb>(
2818 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2819}
2820
2821void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_sub_saturate_u(LiftoffRegister dst,
2822 LiftoffRegister lhs,
2823 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2824 liftoff::EmitSimdNonCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpsubusb,
2825 &Assembler::psubusb>(this, dst, lhs,
2826 rhs);
2827}
2828
2829void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_mul(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2830 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2831 static constexpr RegClass tmp_rc = reg_class_for(ValueType::kS128);
2832 LiftoffRegister tmp =
2833 GetUnusedRegister(tmp_rc, LiftoffRegList::ForRegs(dst, lhs, rhs));
2834 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
2835 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
2836 //I16x8viewofI8x16
2837 //left=AAaaAAaa...AAaaAAaa
2838 //right=BBbbBBbb...BBbbBBbb
2839 //t=00AA00AA...00AA00AA
2840 //s=00BB00BB...00BB00BB
2841 vpsrlw(tmp.fp(), lhs.fp(), 8);
2842 vpsrlw(kScratchDoubleReg, rhs.fp(), 8);
2843 //t=I16x8Mul(t0,t1)
2844 //=>__PP__PP...__PP__PP
2845 vpmullw(tmp.fp(), tmp.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2846 //s=left*256
2847 vpsllw(kScratchDoubleReg, lhs.fp(), 8);
2848 //dst=I16x8Mul(left*256,right)
2849 //=>pp__pp__...pp__pp__
2850 vpmullw(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg, rhs.fp());
2851 //dst=I16x8Shr(dst,8)
2852 //=>00pp00pp...00pp00pp
2853 vpsrlw(dst.fp(), dst.fp(), 8);
2854 //t=I16x8Shl(t,8)
2855 //=>PP00PP00...PP00PP00
2856 vpsllw(tmp.fp(), tmp.fp(), 8);
2857 //dst=I16x8Or(dst,t)
2858 //=>PPppPPpp...PPppPPpp
2859 vpor(dst.fp(), dst.fp(), tmp.fp());
2860 } else {
2861 if (dst.fp() != lhs.fp()) movaps(dst.fp(), lhs.fp());
2862 //I16x8viewofI8x16
2863 //left=AAaaAAaa...AAaaAAaa
2864 //right=BBbbBBbb...BBbbBBbb
2865 //t=00AA00AA...00AA00AA
2866 //s=00BB00BB...00BB00BB
2867 movaps(tmp.fp(), dst.fp());
2868 movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, rhs.fp());
2869 psrlw(tmp.fp(), 8);
2870 psrlw(kScratchDoubleReg, 8);
2871 //dst=left*256
2872 psllw(dst.fp(), 8);
2873 //t=I16x8Mul(t,s)
2874 //=>__PP__PP...__PP__PP
2875 pmullw(tmp.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2876 //dst=I16x8Mul(left*256,right)
2877 //=>pp__pp__...pp__pp__
2878 pmullw(dst.fp(), rhs.fp());
2879 //t=I16x8Shl(t,8)
2880 //=>PP00PP00...PP00PP00
2881 psllw(tmp.fp(), 8);
2882 //dst=I16x8Shr(dst,8)
2883 //=>00pp00pp...00pp00pp
2884 psrlw(dst.fp(), 8);
2885 //dst=I16x8Or(dst,t)
2886 //=>PPppPPpp...PPppPPpp
2887 por(dst.fp(), tmp.fp());
2888 }
2889}
2890
2891void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_min_s(LiftoffRegister dst,
2892 LiftoffRegister lhs,
2893 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2894 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpminsb, &Assembler::pminsb>(
2895 this, dst, lhs, rhs, base::Optional<CpuFeature>(SSE4_1));
2896}
2897
2898void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_min_u(LiftoffRegister dst,
2899 LiftoffRegister lhs,
2900 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2901 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpminub, &Assembler::pminub>(
2902 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2903}
2904
2905void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_max_s(LiftoffRegister dst,
2906 LiftoffRegister lhs,
2907 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2908 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpmaxsb, &Assembler::pmaxsb>(
2909 this, dst, lhs, rhs, base::Optional<CpuFeature>(SSE4_1));
2910}
2911
2912void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_max_u(LiftoffRegister dst,
2913 LiftoffRegister lhs,
2914 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2915 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpmaxub, &Assembler::pmaxub>(
2916 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2917}
2918
2919void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i16x8_neg(LiftoffRegister dst,
2920 LiftoffRegister src) {
2921 if (dst.fp() == src.fp()) {
2922 Pcmpeqd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
2923 Psignw(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
2924 } else {
2925 Pxor(dst.fp(), dst.fp());
2926 Psubw(dst.fp(), src.fp());
2927 }
2928}
2929
2930void LiftoffAssembler::emit_v16x8_anytrue(LiftoffRegister dst,
2931 LiftoffRegister src) {
2932 liftoff::EmitAnyTrue(this, dst, src);
2933}
2934
2935void LiftoffAssembler::emit_v16x8_alltrue(LiftoffRegister dst,
2936 LiftoffRegister src) {
2937 liftoff::EmitAllTrue<&TurboAssembler::Pcmpeqw>(this, dst, src);
2938}
2939
2940void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i16x8_bitmask(LiftoffRegister dst,
2941 LiftoffRegister src) {
2942 XMMRegister tmp = kScratchDoubleReg;
2943 Packsswb(tmp, src.fp());
2944 Pmovmskb(dst.gp(), tmp);
2945 shrq(dst.gp(), Immediate(8));
2946}
2947
2948void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i16x8_shl(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
2949 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
2950 liftoff::EmitSimdShiftOp<&Assembler::vpsllw, &Assembler::psllw, 4>(this, dst,
2951 lhs, rhs);
2952}

2955 int32_t rhs) {

2957 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
2958}

3061void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32x4_neg(LiftoffRegister dst,
3062 LiftoffRegister src) {
3063 if (dst.fp() == src.fp()) {
3064 Pcmpeqd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
3065 Psignd(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
3066 } else {
3067 Pxor(dst.fp(), dst.fp());
3068 Psubd(dst.fp(), src.fp());
3069 }
3070}

3165 LiftoffRegister lhs,
3166 LiftoffRegister rhs) {

3168 this, dst, lhs, rhs, base::Optional<CpuFeature>(SSE4_1));
3169}
3170
3171void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64x2_neg(LiftoffRegister dst,
3172 LiftoffRegister src) {
3173 DoubleRegister reg = dst.fp() == src.fp() ? kScratchDoubleReg : dst.fp();
3174 Pxor(reg, reg);
3175 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
3176 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
3177 vpsubq(dst.fp(), reg, src.fp());
3178 } else {
3179 psubq(reg, src.fp());
3180 if (dst.fp() != reg) movapd(dst.fp(), reg);
3181 }
3182}
3183
3184void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64x2_shl(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
3185 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3186 liftoff::EmitSimdShiftOp<&Assembler::vpsllq, &Assembler::psllq, 6>(this, dst,
3187 lhs, rhs);
3188}
3189
3190void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64x2_shli(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
3191 int32_t rhs) {
3192 liftoff::EmitSimdShiftOpImm<&Assembler::vpsllq, &Assembler::psllq, 6>(
3193 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
3194}
3195
3196void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64x2_shr_s(LiftoffRegister dst,
3197 LiftoffRegister lhs,
3198 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3199 liftoff::EmitI64x2ShrS(this, dst, lhs, rhs.gp(),
3200 /*shift_is_rcx=*/rhs.gp() == rcx);
3201}
3202
3203void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64x2_shri_s(LiftoffRegister dst,
3204 LiftoffRegister lhs, int32_t rhs) {
3205 liftoff::EmitI64x2ShrS(this, dst, lhs, Immediate(rhs));
3206}
3207
3208void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64x2_shr_u(LiftoffRegister dst,
3209 LiftoffRegister lhs,
3210 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3211 liftoff::EmitSimdShiftOp<&Assembler::vpsrlq, &Assembler::psrlq, 6>(this, dst,
3212 lhs, rhs);
3213}
3214
3215void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64x2_shri_u(LiftoffRegister dst,
3216 LiftoffRegister lhs, int32_t rhs) {
3217 liftoff::EmitSimdShiftOpImm<&Assembler::vpsrlq, &Assembler::psrlq, 6>(
3218 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
3219}
3220
3221void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64x2_add(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
3222 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3223 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpaddq, &Assembler::paddq>(
3224 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
3225}
3226
3227void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64x2_sub(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
3228 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3229 liftoff::EmitSimdNonCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpsubq, &Assembler::psubq>(
3230 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
3231}
3232
3233void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64x2_mul(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
3234 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3235 static constexpr RegClass tmp_rc = reg_class_for(ValueType::kS128);
3236 LiftoffRegister tmp1 =
3237 GetUnusedRegister(tmp_rc, LiftoffRegList::ForRegs(dst, lhs, rhs));
3238 LiftoffRegister tmp2 =
3239 GetUnusedRegister(tmp_rc, LiftoffRegList::ForRegs(dst, lhs, rhs, tmp1));
3240 Movaps(tmp1.fp(), lhs.fp());
3241 Movaps(tmp2.fp(), rhs.fp());
3242 //Multiplyhighdwordofeachqwordofleftwithright.
3243 Psrlq(tmp1.fp(), 32);
3244 Pmuludq(tmp1.fp(), rhs.fp());
3245 //Multiplyhighdwordofeachqwordofrightwithleft.
3246 Psrlq(tmp2.fp(), 32);
3247 Pmuludq(tmp2.fp(), lhs.fp());
3248 Paddq(tmp2.fp(), tmp1.fp());
3249 Psllq(tmp2.fp(), 32);
3250 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
3251 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
3252 vpmuludq(dst.fp(), lhs.fp(), rhs.fp());
3253 } else {
3254 if (dst.fp() != lhs.fp()) movaps(dst.fp(), lhs.fp());
3255 pmuludq(dst.fp(), rhs.fp());
3256 }
3257 Paddq(dst.fp(), tmp2.fp());
3258}
3259
3260void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32x4_abs(LiftoffRegister dst,
3261 LiftoffRegister src) {
3262 if (dst.fp() == src.fp()) {
3263 Pcmpeqd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
3264 Psrld(kScratchDoubleReg, static_cast<byte>(1));
3265 Andps(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
3266 } else {
3267 Pcmpeqd(dst.fp(), dst.fp());
3268 Psrld(dst.fp(), static_cast<byte>(1));
3269 Andps(dst.fp(), src.fp());
3270 }
3271}
3272
3273void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32x4_neg(LiftoffRegister dst,
3274 LiftoffRegister src) {
3275 if (dst.fp() == src.fp()) {
3276 Pcmpeqd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
3277 Pslld(kScratchDoubleReg, static_cast<byte>(31));
3278 Xorps(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
3279 } else {
3280 Pcmpeqd(dst.fp(), dst.fp());
3281 Pslld(dst.fp(), static_cast<byte>(31));
3282 Xorps(dst.fp(), src.fp());
3283 }
3284}
3285
3286void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32x4_sqrt(LiftoffRegister dst,
3287 LiftoffRegister src) {
3288 Sqrtps(dst.fp(), src.fp());
3289}
3290
3291void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32x4_add(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
3292 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3293 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vaddps, &Assembler::addps>(
3294 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
3295}
3296
3297void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32x4_sub(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
3298 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3299 liftoff::EmitSimdNonCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vsubps, &Assembler::subps>(
3300 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
3301}
3302
3303void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32x4_mul(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
3304 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3305 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vmulps, &Assembler::mulps>(
3306 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
3307}
3308
3309void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32x4_div(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
3310 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3311 liftoff::EmitSimdNonCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vdivps, &Assembler::divps>(
3312 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
3313}
3314
3315void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32x4_min(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
3316 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3317 // The minps instruction doesn't propagate NaNs and +0's in its first
3318 // operand. Perform minps in both orders, merge the results, and adjust.
3319 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
3320 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
3321 vminps(kScratchDoubleReg, lhs.fp(), rhs.fp());
3322 vminps(dst.fp(), rhs.fp(), lhs.fp());
3323 } else if (dst.fp() == lhs.fp() || dst.fp() == rhs.fp()) {
3324 XMMRegister src = dst.fp() == lhs.fp() ? rhs.fp() : lhs.fp();
3325 movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, src);
3326 minps(kScratchDoubleReg, dst.fp());
3327 minps(dst.fp(), src);
3328 } else {
3329 movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, lhs.fp());
3330 minps(kScratchDoubleReg, rhs.fp());
3331 movaps(dst.fp(), rhs.fp());
3332 minps(dst.fp(), lhs.fp());
3333 }
3334 // propagate -0's and NaNs, which may be non-canonical.
3335 Orps(kScratchDoubleReg, dst.fp());
3336 // Canonicalize NaNs by quieting and clearing the payload.
3337 Cmpps(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg, int8_t{3});
3338 Orps(kScratchDoubleReg, dst.fp());
3339 Psrld(dst.fp(), byte{10});
3340 Andnps(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
3341}
3342
3343void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32x4_max(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
3344 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3345 // The maxps instruction doesn't propagate NaNs and +0's in its first
3346 // operand. Perform maxps in both orders, merge the results, and adjust.
3347 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
3348 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
3349 vmaxps(kScratchDoubleReg, lhs.fp(), rhs.fp());
3350 vmaxps(dst.fp(), rhs.fp(), lhs.fp());
3351 } else if (dst.fp() == lhs.fp() || dst.fp() == rhs.fp()) {
3352 XMMRegister src = dst.fp() == lhs.fp() ? rhs.fp() : lhs.fp();
3353 movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, src);
3354 maxps(kScratchDoubleReg, dst.fp());
3355 maxps(dst.fp(), src);
3356 } else {
3357 movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, lhs.fp());
3358 maxps(kScratchDoubleReg, rhs.fp());
3359 movaps(dst.fp(), rhs.fp());
3360 maxps(dst.fp(), lhs.fp());
3361 }
3362 // Find discrepancies.
3363 Xorps(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
3364 // Propagate NaNs, which may be non-canonical.
3365 Orps(kScratchDoubleReg, dst.fp());
3366 // Propagate sign discrepancy and (subtle) quiet NaNs.
3367 Subps(kScratchDoubleReg, dst.fp());
3368 // Canonicalize NaNs by clearing the payload. Sign is non-deterministic.
3369 Cmpps(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg, int8_t{3});
3370 Psrld(dst.fp(), byte{10});
3371 Andnps(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
3372}
3373
3374void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64x2_abs(LiftoffRegister dst,
3375 LiftoffRegister src) {
3376 if (dst.fp() == src.fp()) {
3377 Pcmpeqd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
3378 Psrlq(kScratchDoubleReg, static_cast<byte>(1));
3379 Andpd(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
3380 } else {
3381 Pcmpeqd(dst.fp(), dst.fp());
3382 Psrlq(dst.fp(), static_cast<byte>(1));
3383 Andpd(dst.fp(), src.fp());
3384 }
3385}
3386
3387void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64x2_neg(LiftoffRegister dst,
3388 LiftoffRegister src) {
3389 if (dst.fp() == src.fp()) {
3390 Pcmpeqd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
3391 Psllq(kScratchDoubleReg, static_cast<byte>(63));
3392 Xorpd(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
3393 } else {
3394 Pcmpeqd(dst.fp(), dst.fp());
3395 Psllq(dst.fp(), static_cast<byte>(63));
3396 Xorpd(dst.fp(), src.fp());
3397 }
3398}
3399
3400void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64x2_sqrt(LiftoffRegister dst,
3401 LiftoffRegister src) {
3402 Sqrtpd(dst.fp(), src.fp());
3403}
3404
3405void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64x2_add(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
3406 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3407 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vaddpd, &Assembler::addpd>(
3408 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
3409}
3410
3411void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64x2_sub(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
3412 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3413 liftoff::EmitSimdNonCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vsubpd, &Assembler::subpd>(
3414 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
3415}
3416
3417void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64x2_mul(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
3418 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3419 liftoff::EmitSimdCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vmulpd, &Assembler::mulpd>(
3420 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
3421}
3422
3423void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64x2_div(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
3424 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3425 liftoff::EmitSimdNonCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vdivpd, &Assembler::divpd>(
3426 this, dst, lhs, rhs);
3427}
3428
3429void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64x2_min(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
3430 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3431 // The minpd instruction doesn't propagate NaNs and +0's in its first
3432 // operand. Perform minpd in both orders, merge the results, and adjust.
3433 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
3434 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
3435 vminpd(kScratchDoubleReg, lhs.fp(), rhs.fp());
3436 vminpd(dst.fp(), rhs.fp(), lhs.fp());
3437 } else if (dst.fp() == lhs.fp() || dst.fp() == rhs.fp()) {
3438 XMMRegister src = dst.fp() == lhs.fp() ? rhs.fp() : lhs.fp();
3439 movapd(kScratchDoubleReg, src);
3440 minpd(kScratchDoubleReg, dst.fp());
3441 minpd(dst.fp(), src);
3442 } else {
3443 movapd(kScratchDoubleReg, lhs.fp());
3444 minpd(kScratchDoubleReg, rhs.fp());
3445 movapd(dst.fp(), rhs.fp());
3446 minpd(dst.fp(), lhs.fp());
3447 }
3448 // propagate -0's and NaNs, which may be non-canonical.
3449 Orpd(kScratchDoubleReg, dst.fp());
3450 // Canonicalize NaNs by quieting and clearing the payload.
3451 Cmppd(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg, int8_t{3});
3452 Orpd(kScratchDoubleReg, dst.fp());
3453 Psrlq(dst.fp(), 13);
3454 Andnpd(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
3455}
3456
3457void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64x2_max(LiftoffRegister dst, LiftoffRegister lhs,
3458 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3459 // The maxpd instruction doesn't propagate NaNs and +0's in its first
3460 // operand. Perform maxpd in both orders, merge the results, and adjust.
3461 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
3462 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
3463 vmaxpd(kScratchDoubleReg, lhs.fp(), rhs.fp());
3464 vmaxpd(dst.fp(), rhs.fp(), lhs.fp());
3465 } else if (dst.fp() == lhs.fp() || dst.fp() == rhs.fp()) {
3466 XMMRegister src = dst.fp() == lhs.fp() ? rhs.fp() : lhs.fp();
3467 movapd(kScratchDoubleReg, src);
3468 maxpd(kScratchDoubleReg, dst.fp());
3469 maxpd(dst.fp(), src);
3470 } else {
3471 movapd(kScratchDoubleReg, lhs.fp());
3472 maxpd(kScratchDoubleReg, rhs.fp());
3473 movapd(dst.fp(), rhs.fp());
3474 maxpd(dst.fp(), lhs.fp());
3475 }
3476 // Find discrepancies.
3477 Xorpd(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
3478 // Propagate NaNs, which may be non-canonical.
3479 Orpd(kScratchDoubleReg, dst.fp());
3480 // Propagate sign discrepancy and (subtle) quiet NaNs.
3481 Subpd(kScratchDoubleReg, dst.fp());
3482 // Canonicalize NaNs by clearing the payload. Sign is non-deterministic.
3483 Cmppd(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg, int8_t{3});
3484 Psrlq(dst.fp(), 13);
3485 Andnpd(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
3486}
3487
3488void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32x4_sconvert_f32x4(LiftoffRegister dst,
3489 LiftoffRegister src) {
3490 // NAN->0
3491 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
3492 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
3493 vcmpeqps(kScratchDoubleReg, src.fp(), src.fp());
3494 vpand(dst.fp(), src.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
3495 } else {
3496 movaps(kScratchDoubleReg, src.fp());
3497 cmpeqps(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
3498 if (dst.fp() != src.fp()) movaps(dst.fp(), src.fp());
3499 pand(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
3500 }
3501 // Set top bit if >= 0 (but not -0.0!).
3502 Pxor(kScratchDoubleReg, dst.fp());
3503 // Convert to int.
3504 Cvttps2dq(dst.fp(), dst.fp());
3505 // Set top bit if >=0 is now < 0.
3506 Pand(kScratchDoubleReg, dst.fp());
3507 Psrad(kScratchDoubleReg, byte{31});
3508 // Set positive overflow lanes to 0x7FFFFFFF.
3509 Pxor(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
3510}
3511
3512void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32x4_uconvert_f32x4(LiftoffRegister dst,
3513 LiftoffRegister src) {
3514 // NAN->0, negative->0.
3515 Pxor(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
3516 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
3517 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
3518 vmaxps(dst.fp(), src.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
3519 } else {
3520 if (dst.fp() != src.fp()) movaps(dst.fp(), src.fp());
3521 maxps(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
3522 }
3523 // scratch: float representation of max_signed.
3524 Pcmpeqd(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
3525 Psrld(kScratchDoubleReg, uint8_t{1}); // 0x7fffffff
3526 Cvtdq2ps(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg); // 0x4f000000
3527 // scratch2: convert (src-max_signed).
3528 // Set positive overflow lanes to 0x7FFFFFFF.
3529 // Set negative lanes to 0.
3530 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
3531 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
3532 vsubps(liftoff::kScratchDoubleReg2, dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
3533 } else {
3534 movaps(liftoff::kScratchDoubleReg2, dst.fp());
3535 subps(liftoff::kScratchDoubleReg2, kScratchDoubleReg);
3536 }
3537 Cmpleps(kScratchDoubleReg, liftoff::kScratchDoubleReg2);
3538 Cvttps2dq(liftoff::kScratchDoubleReg2, liftoff::kScratchDoubleReg2);
3539 Pxor(liftoff::kScratchDoubleReg2, kScratchDoubleReg);
3540 Pxor(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg);
3541 Pmaxsd(liftoff::kScratchDoubleReg2, kScratchDoubleReg);
3542 // Convert to int. Overflow lanes above max_signed will be 0x80000000.
3543 Cvttps2dq(dst.fp(), dst.fp());
3544 // Add (src-max_signed) for overflow lanes.
3545 Paddd(dst.fp(), liftoff::kScratchDoubleReg2);
3546}
3547
3548void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32x4_sconvert_i32x4(LiftoffRegister dst,
3549 LiftoffRegister src) {
3550 Cvtdq2ps(dst.fp(), src.fp());
3551}
3552
3553void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32x4_uconvert_i32x4(LiftoffRegister dst,
3554 LiftoffRegister src) {
3555 Pxor(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg); // Zeros.
3556 Pblendw(kScratchDoubleReg, src.fp(), uint8_t{0x55}); // Get lo 16 bits.
3557 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
3558 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
3559 vpsubd(dst.fp(), src.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg); // Get hi 16 bits.
3560 } else {
3561 if (dst.fp() != src.fp()) movaps(dst.fp(), src.fp());
3562 psubd(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg);
3563 }
3564 Cvtdq2ps(kScratchDoubleReg, kScratchDoubleReg); // Convert lo exactly.
3565 Psrld(dst.fp(), byte{1}); // Divide by 2 to get in unsigned range.
3566 Cvtdq2ps(dst.fp(), dst.fp()); // Convert hi, exactly.
3567 Addps(dst.fp(), dst.fp()); // Double hi, exactly.
3568 Addps(dst.fp(), kScratchDoubleReg); // Add hi and lo, may round.
3569}
3570
3571void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_sconvert_i16x8(LiftoffRegister dst,
3572 LiftoffRegister lhs,
3573 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3574 liftoff::EmitSimdNonCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpacksswb,
3575 &Assembler::packsswb>(this, dst, lhs,
3576 rhs);
3577}
3578
3579void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_uconvert_i16x8(LiftoffRegister dst,
3580 LiftoffRegister lhs,
3581 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3582 liftoff::EmitSimdNonCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpackuswb,
3583 &Assembler::packuswb>(this, dst, lhs,
3584 rhs);
3585}
3586
3587void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i16x8_sconvert_i32x4(LiftoffRegister dst,
3588 LiftoffRegister lhs,
3589 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3590 liftoff::EmitSimdNonCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpackssdw,
3591 &Assembler::packssdw>(this, dst, lhs,
3592 rhs);
3593}
3594
3595void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i16x8_uconvert_i32x4(LiftoffRegister dst,
3596 LiftoffRegister lhs,
3597 LiftoffRegister rhs) {
3598 liftoff::EmitSimdNonCommutativeBinOp<&Assembler::vpackusdw,
3599 &Assembler::packusdw>(this, dst, lhs,
3600 rhs, SSE4_1);
3601}
3602
3603void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i16x8_sconvert_i8x16_low(LiftoffRegister dst,
3604 LiftoffRegister src) {
3605 Pmovsxbw(dst.fp(), src.fp());
3606}
3607
3608void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i16x8_sconvert_i8x16_high(LiftoffRegister dst,
3609 LiftoffRegister src) {
3610 Palignr(dst.fp(), src.fp(), static_cast<uint8_t>(8));
3611 Pmovsxbw(dst.fp(), dst.fp());
3612}

3614void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i16x8_uconvert_i8x16_low(LiftoffRegister dst,
3615 LiftoffRegister src) {
3616 Pmovzxbw(dst.fp(), src.fp());
3617}

3620 LiftoffRegister src) {
3621 Palignr(dst.fp(), src.fp(), static_cast<uint8_t>(8));
3622 Pmovzxbw(dst.fp(), dst.fp());
3623}
