3625void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32x4_sconvert_i16x8_low(LiftoffRegister dst,
3626 LiftoffRegister src) {
3627 Pmovsxwd(dst.fp(), src.fp());
3628}
3629
3630void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32x4_sconvert_i16x8_high(LiftoffRegister dst,
3631 LiftoffRegister src) {
3632 Palignr(dst.fp(), src.fp(), static_cast<uint8_t>(8));
3633 Pmovsxwd(dst.fp(), dst.fp());
3634}
3635
3636void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32x4_uconvert_i16x8_low(LiftoffRegister dst,
3637 LiftoffRegister src) {
3638 Pmovzxwd(dst.fp(), src.fp());
3639}

3641void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32x4_uconvert_i16x8_high(LiftoffRegister dst,
3642 LiftoffRegister src) {

3649 LiftoffRegister rhs) {

3651 this, dst, rhs, lhs);
3652}

3683void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_extract_lane_s(LiftoffRegister dst,
3684 LiftoffRegister lhs,
3685 uint8_t imm_lane_idx) {
3686 Pextrb(dst.gp(), lhs.fp(), imm_lane_idx);
3687 movsxbl(dst.gp(), dst.gp());
3688}
3689
3690void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_extract_lane_u(LiftoffRegister dst,
3691 LiftoffRegister lhs,
3692 uint8_t imm_lane_idx) {
3693 Pextrb(dst.gp(), lhs.fp(), imm_lane_idx);
3694}
3695
3696void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i16x8_extract_lane_s(LiftoffRegister dst,
3697 LiftoffRegister lhs,
3698 uint8_t imm_lane_idx) {
3699 Pextrw(dst.gp(), lhs.fp(), imm_lane_idx);
3700 movsxwl(dst.gp(), dst.gp());
3701}
3702
3703void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i16x8_extract_lane_u(LiftoffRegister dst,
3704 LiftoffRegister lhs,
3705 uint8_t imm_lane_idx) {

3707}
3708
3709void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32x4_extract_lane(LiftoffRegister dst,
3710 LiftoffRegister lhs,
3711 uint8_t imm_lane_idx) {
3712 Pextrd(dst.gp(), lhs.fp(), imm_lane_idx);
3713}
3714
3715void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64x2_extract_lane(LiftoffRegister dst,
3716 LiftoffRegister lhs,
3717 uint8_t imm_lane_idx) {
3718 Pextrq(dst.gp(), lhs.fp(), static_cast<int8_t>(imm_lane_idx));
3719}
3720
3721void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32x4_extract_lane(LiftoffRegister dst,
3722 LiftoffRegister lhs,
3723 uint8_t imm_lane_idx) {
3724 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
3725 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
3726 vshufps(dst.fp(), lhs.fp(), lhs.fp(), imm_lane_idx);
3727 } else {
3728 if (dst.fp() != lhs.fp()) movaps(dst.fp(), lhs.fp());
3729 if (imm_lane_idx != 0) shufps(dst.fp(), dst.fp(), imm_lane_idx);
3730 }
3731}
3732
3733void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64x2_extract_lane(LiftoffRegister dst,
3734 LiftoffRegister lhs,
3735 uint8_t imm_lane_idx) {
3736 Pextrq(kScratchRegister, lhs.fp(), static_cast<int8_t>(imm_lane_idx));
3737 Movq(dst.fp(), kScratchRegister);
3738}
3739
3740void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i8x16_replace_lane(LiftoffRegister dst,
3741 LiftoffRegister src1,
3742 LiftoffRegister src2,
3743 uint8_t imm_lane_idx) {
3744 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
3745 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
3746 vpinsrb(dst.fp(), src1.fp(), src2.gp(), imm_lane_idx);
3747 } else {
3748 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, SSE4_1);
3749 if (dst.fp() != src1.fp()) movaps(dst.fp(), src1.fp());
3750 pinsrb(dst.fp(), src2.gp(), imm_lane_idx);
3751 }
3752}
3753
3754void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i16x8_replace_lane(LiftoffRegister dst,
3755 LiftoffRegister src1,
3756 LiftoffRegister src2,
3757 uint8_t imm_lane_idx) {
3758 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
3759 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
3760 vpinsrw(dst.fp(), src1.fp(), src2.gp(), imm_lane_idx);
3761 } else {
3762 if (dst.fp() != src1.fp()) movaps(dst.fp(), src1.fp());
3763 pinsrw(dst.fp(), src2.gp(), imm_lane_idx);
3764 }
3765}
3766
3767void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i32x4_replace_lane(LiftoffRegister dst,
3768 LiftoffRegister src1,
3769 LiftoffRegister src2,
3770 uint8_t imm_lane_idx) {
3771 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
3772 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
3773 vpinsrd(dst.fp(), src1.fp(), src2.gp(), imm_lane_idx);
3774 } else {
3775 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, SSE4_1);
3776 if (dst.fp() != src1.fp()) movaps(dst.fp(), src1.fp());
3777 pinsrd(dst.fp(), src2.gp(), imm_lane_idx);
3778 }
3779}
3780
3781void LiftoffAssembler::emit_i64x2_replace_lane(LiftoffRegister dst,
3782 LiftoffRegister src1,
3783 LiftoffRegister src2,
3784 uint8_t imm_lane_idx) {
3785 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
3786 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
3787 vpinsrq(dst.fp(), src1.fp(), src2.gp(), imm_lane_idx);
3788 } else {
3789 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, SSE4_1);
3790 if (dst.fp() != src1.fp()) movaps(dst.fp(), src1.fp());
3791 pinsrq(dst.fp(), src2.gp(), imm_lane_idx);
3792 }
3793}
3794
3795void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f32x4_replace_lane(LiftoffRegister dst,
3796 LiftoffRegister src1,
3797 LiftoffRegister src2,
3798 uint8_t imm_lane_idx) {
3799 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
3800 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
3801 vinsertps(dst.fp(), src1.fp(), src2.fp(), (imm_lane_idx << 4) & 0x30);
3802 } else {
3803 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, SSE4_1);
3804 if (dst.fp() != src1.fp()) movaps(dst.fp(), src1.fp());
3805 insertps(dst.fp(), src2.fp(), (imm_lane_idx << 4) & 0x30);
3806 }
3807}
3808
3809void LiftoffAssembler::emit_f64x2_replace_lane(LiftoffRegister dst,
3810 LiftoffRegister src1,
3811 LiftoffRegister src2,
3812 uint8_t imm_lane_idx) {
3813 if (CpuFeatures::IsSupported(AVX)) {
3814 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, AVX);
3815 if (imm_lane_idx == 0) {
3816 vpblendw(dst.fp(), src1.fp(), src2.fp(), 0b00001111);
3817 } else {
3818 vmovlhps(dst.fp(), src1.fp(), src2.fp());
3819 }
3820 } else {
3821 CpuFeatureScope scope(this, SSE4_1);
3822 if (dst.fp() != src1.fp()) movaps(dst.fp(), src1.fp());
3823 if (imm_lane_idx == 0) {
3824 pblendw(dst.fp(), src2.fp(), 0b00001111);
3825 } else {
3826 movlhps(dst.fp(), src2.fp());
3827 }
3828 }
3829}
3830
3831void LiftoffAssembler::StackCheck(Label* ool_code, Register limit_address) {
3832 cmpq(rsp, Operand(limit_address, 0));
3833 j(below_equal, ool_code);
3834}
3835
3836void LiftoffAssembler::CallTrapCallbackForTesting() {
3837 PrepareCallCFunction(0);
3838 CallCFunction(ExternalReference::wasm_call_trap_callback_for_testing(), 0);
3839}
3840
3841void LiftoffAssembler::AssertUnreachable(AbortReason reason) {
3842 TurboAssembler::AssertUnreachable(reason);
3843}
3844
3845void LiftoffAssembler::PushRegisters(LiftoffRegList regs) {
3846 LiftoffRegList gp_regs = regs & kGpCacheRegList;
3847 while (!gp_regs.is_empty()) {
3848 LiftoffRegister reg = gp_regs.GetFirstRegSet();
3849 pushq(reg.gp());
3850 gp_regs.clear(reg);
3851 }
3852 LiftoffRegList fp_regs = regs & kFpCacheRegList;
3853 unsigned num_fp_regs = fp_regs.GetNumRegsSet();
3854 if (num_fp_regs) {
3855 AllocateStackSpace(num_fp_regs * kSimd128Size);
3856 unsigned offset = 0;
3857 while (!fp_regs.is_empty()) {
3858 LiftoffRegister reg = fp_regs.GetFirstRegSet();
3859 Movdqu(Operand(rsp, offset), reg.fp());
3860 fp_regs.clear(reg);
3861 offset += kSimd128Size;
3862 }
3863 DCHECK_EQ(offset, num_fp_regs * kSimd128Size)((void) 0);
3864 }
3865}
3866
3867void LiftoffAssembler::PopRegisters(LiftoffRegList regs) {
3868 LiftoffRegList fp_regs = regs & kFpCacheRegList;
3869 unsigned fp_offset = 0;
3870 while (!fp_regs.is_empty()) {
3871 LiftoffRegister reg = fp_regs.GetFirstRegSet();
3872 Movdqu(reg.fp(), Operand(rsp, fp_offset));
3873 fp_regs.clear(reg);
3874 fp_offset += kSimd128Size;
3875 }
3876 if (fp_offset) addq(rsp, Immediate(fp_offset));
3877 LiftoffRegList gp_regs = regs & kGpCacheRegList;
3878 while (!gp_regs.is_empty()) {
3879 LiftoffRegister reg = gp_regs.GetLastRegSet();
3880 popq(reg.gp());
3881 gp_regs.clear(reg);
3882 }
3883}
3884
3885void LiftoffAssembler::DropStackSlotsAndRet(uint32_t num_stack_slots) {
3886 DCHECK_LT(num_stack_slots,((void) 0)
3887 (1 << 16) / kSystemPointerSize)((void) 0); // 16 bit immediate
3888 ret(static_cast<int>(num_stack_slots * kSystemPointerSize));
3889}
3890
3891void LiftoffAssembler::CallC(const wasm::FunctionSig* sig,
3892 const LiftoffRegister* args,
3893 const LiftoffRegister* rets,
3894 ValueType out_argument_type, int stack_bytes,
3895 ExternalReference ext_ref) {
3896 AllocateStackSpace(stack_bytes);
3897
3898 int arg_bytes = 0;
3899 for (ValueType param_type : sig->parameters()) {
3900 liftoff::Store(this, Operand(rsp, arg_bytes), *args++, param_type);
3901 arg_bytes += param_type.element_size_bytes();
3902 }
3903 DCHECK_LE(arg_bytes, stack_bytes)((void) 0);
3904
3905 // Pass a pointer to the buffer with the arguments to the C function.
3906 movq(arg_reg_1, rsp);
3907
3908 constexpr int kNumCCallArgs = 1;
3909
3910 // Now call the C function.
3911 PrepareCallCFunction(kNumCCallArgs);
3912 CallCFunction(ext_ref, kNumCCallArgs);
3913
3914 // Move return value to the right register.
3915 const LiftoffRegister* next_result_reg = rets;
3916 if (sig->return_count() > 0) {
3917 DCHECK_EQ(1, sig->return_count())((void) 0);
3918 constexpr Register kReturnReg = rax;
3919 if (kReturnReg != next_result_reg->gp()) {
3920 Move(*next_result_reg, LiftoffRegister(kReturnReg), sig->GetReturn(0));
3921 }
3922 ++next_result_reg;
3923 }
3924
3925 // Load potential output value from the buffer on the stack.
3926 if (out_argument_type != kWasmStmt) {
3927 liftoff::Load(this, *next_result_reg, Operand(rsp, 0), out_argument_type);
3928 }
3929
3930 addq(rsp, Immediate(stack_bytes));
3931}
3932
3933void LiftoffAssembler::CallNativeWasmCode(Address addr) {
3934 near_call(addr, RelocInfo::WASM_CALL);
3935}
3936
3937void LiftoffAssembler::TailCallNativeWasmCode(Address addr) {
3938 near_jmp(addr, RelocInfo::WASM_CALL);
3939}
3940
3941void LiftoffAssembler::CallIndirect(const wasm::FunctionSig* sig,
3942 compiler::CallDescriptor* call_descriptor,
3943 Register target) {
3944 if (target == no_reg) {
3945 popq(kScratchRegister);
3946 target = kScratchRegister;
3947 }
3948 if (FLAG_untrusted_code_mitigations) {
3949 RetpolineCall(target);
3950 } else {
3951 call(target);
3952 }
3953}
3954
3955void LiftoffAssembler::TailCallIndirect(Register target) {
3956 if (target == no_reg) {
3957 popq(kScratchRegister);
3958 target = kScratchRegister;
3959 }
3960 if (FLAG_untrusted_code_mitigations) {
3961 RetpolineJump(target);
3962 } else {
3963 jmp(target);
3964 }
3965}
3966
3967void LiftoffAssembler::CallRuntimeStub(WasmCode::RuntimeStubId sid) {
3968 // A direct call to a wasm runtime stub defined in this module.
3969 // Just encode the stub index. This will be patched at relocation.
3970 near_call(static_cast<Address>(sid), RelocInfo::WASM_STUB_CALL);
3971}
3972
3973void LiftoffAssembler::AllocateStackSlot(Register addr, uint32_t size) {
3974 AllocateStackSpace(size);
3975 movq(addr, rsp);
3976}
3977
3978void LiftoffAssembler::DeallocateStackSlot(uint32_t size) {
3979 addq(rsp, Immediate(size));
3980}
3981
3982void LiftoffStackSlots::Construct() {
3983 for (auto& slot : slots_) {
3984 const LiftoffAssembler::VarState& src = slot.src_;
3985 switch (src.loc()) {
3986 case LiftoffAssembler::VarState::kStack:
3987 if (src.type() == kWasmI32) {
3988 // Load i32 values to a register first to ensure they are zero
3989 // extended.
3990 asm_->movl(kScratchRegister, liftoff::GetStackSlot(slot.src_offset_));
3991 asm_->pushq(kScratchRegister);
3992 } else if (src.type() == kWasmS128) {
3993 // Since offsets are subtracted from sp, we need a smaller offset to
3994 // push the top of a s128 value.
3995 asm_->pushq(liftoff::GetStackSlot(slot.src_offset_ - 8));
3996 asm_->pushq(liftoff::GetStackSlot(slot.src_offset_));
3997 } else {
3998 // For all other types, just push the whole (8-byte) stack slot.
3999 // This is also ok for f32 values (even though we copy 4 uninitialized
4000 // bytes), because f32 and f64 values are clearly distinguished in
4001 // Turbofan, so the uninitialized bytes are never accessed.
4002 asm_->pushq(liftoff::GetStackSlot(slot.src_offset_));
4003 }
4004 break;
4005 case LiftoffAssembler::VarState::kRegister:
4006 liftoff::push(asm_, src.reg(), src.type());
4007 break;
4008 case LiftoffAssembler::VarState::kIntConst:
4009 asm_->pushq(Immediate(src.i32_const()));
4010 break;
4011 }
4012 }
4013}
4014
4015#undef RETURN_FALSE_IF_MISSING_CPU_FEATURE
4016
4017} // namespace wasm
4018} // namespace internal
4019} // namespace v8
4020
4021#endif // V8_WASM_BASELINE_X64_LIFTOFF_ASSEMBLER_X64_H_
